00092 /* few helpers for countall etc. */
00093 int count_particles(ParticleSystem *psys)
00094 {
00095     ParticleSettings *part=psys->part;
00096     PARTICLE_P;
00097     int tot=0;
00098 
00099     LOOP_SHOWN_PARTICLES {
00100         if (pa->alive == PARS_UNBORN && (part->flag & PART_UNBORN)==0);
00101         else if (pa->alive == PARS_DEAD && (part->flag & PART_DIED)==0);
00102         else tot++;
00103     }
00104     return tot;
00105 }
00106 int count_particles_mod(ParticleSystem *psys, int totgr, int cur)
00107 {
00108     ParticleSettings *part=psys->part;
00109     PARTICLE_P;
00110     int tot=0;
00111 
00112     LOOP_SHOWN_PARTICLES {
00113         if (pa->alive == PARS_UNBORN && (part->flag & PART_UNBORN)==0);
00114         else if (pa->alive == PARS_DEAD && (part->flag & PART_DIED)==0);
00115         else if (p%totgr==cur) tot++;
00116     }
00117     return tot;
00118 }
00119 /* we allocate path cache memory in chunks instead of a big continguous
00120  * chunk, windows' memory allocater fails to find big blocks of memory often */
00121 
00122 #define PATH_CACHE_BUF_SIZE 1024
00123 
00124 static ParticleCacheKey **psys_alloc_path_cache_buffers(ListBase *bufs, int tot, int steps)
00125 {
00126     LinkData *buf;
00127     ParticleCacheKey **cache;
00128     int i, totkey, totbufkey;
00129 
00130     tot= MAX2(tot, 1);
00131     totkey = 0;
00132     cache = MEM_callocN(tot*sizeof(void*), "PathCacheArray");
00133 
00134     while (totkey < tot) {
00135         totbufkey= MIN2(tot-totkey, PATH_CACHE_BUF_SIZE);
00136         buf= MEM_callocN(sizeof(LinkData), "PathCacheLinkData");
00137         buf->data= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ParticleCacheKey)*totbufkey*steps, "ParticleCacheKey");
00138 
00139         for (i=0; i<totbufkey; i++)
00140             cache[totkey+i] = ((ParticleCacheKey*)buf->data) + i*steps;
00141 
00142         totkey += totbufkey;
00143         BLI_addtail(bufs, buf);
00144     }
00145 
00146     return cache;
00147 }
00148 
00149 static void psys_free_path_cache_buffers(ParticleCacheKey **cache, ListBase *bufs)
00150 {
00151     LinkData *buf;
00152 
00153     if (cache)
00154         MEM_freeN(cache);
00155 
00156     for (buf= bufs->first; buf; buf=buf->next)
00157         MEM_freeN(buf->data);
00158     BLI_freelistN(bufs);
00159 }

00164 /* get object's active particle system safely */
00165 ParticleSystem *psys_get_current(Object *ob)
00166 {
00167     ParticleSystem *psys;
00168     if (ob==NULL) return NULL;
00169 
00170     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next) {
00171         if (psys->flag & PSYS_CURRENT)
00172             return psys;
00173     }
00174     
00175     return NULL;
00176 }
00177 short psys_get_current_num(Object *ob)
00178 {
00179     ParticleSystem *psys;
00180     short i;
00181 
00182     if (ob==NULL) return 0;
00183 
00184     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first, i=0; psys; psys=psys->next, i++)
00185         if (psys->flag & PSYS_CURRENT)
00186             return i;
00187     
00188     return i;
00189 }
00190 void psys_set_current_num(Object *ob, int index)
00191 {
00192     ParticleSystem *psys;
00193     short i;
00194 
00195     if (ob==NULL) return;
00196 
00197     for (psys=ob->particlesystem.first, i=0; psys; psys=psys->next, i++) {
00198         if (i == index)
00199             psys->flag |= PSYS_CURRENT;
00200         else
00201             psys->flag &= ~PSYS_CURRENT;
00202     }
00203 }

00222 Object *psys_get_lattice(ParticleSimulationData *sim)
00223 {
00224     Object *lattice=NULL;
00225     
00226     if (psys_in_edit_mode(sim->scene, sim->psys)==0) {
00227 
00228         ModifierData *md = (ModifierData*)psys_get_modifier(sim->ob, sim->psys);
00229 
00230         for (; md; md=md->next) {
00231             if (md->type==eModifierType_Lattice) {
00232                 LatticeModifierData *lmd = (LatticeModifierData *)md;
00233                 lattice=lmd->object;
00234                 break;
00235             }
00236         }
00237         if (lattice)
00238             init_latt_deform(lattice, NULL);
00239     }
00240 
00241     return lattice;
00242 }
00243 void psys_disable_all(Object *ob)
00244 {
00245     ParticleSystem *psys=ob->particlesystem.first;
00246 
00247     for (; psys; psys=psys->next)
00248         psys->flag |= PSYS_DISABLED;
00249 }
00250 void psys_enable_all(Object *ob)
00251 {
00252     ParticleSystem *psys=ob->particlesystem.first;
00253 
00254     for (; psys; psys=psys->next)
00255         psys->flag &= ~PSYS_DISABLED;
00256 }
00257 int psys_in_edit_mode(Scene *scene, ParticleSystem *psys)
00258 {
00259     return (scene->basact && (scene->basact->object->mode & OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT) && psys==psys_get_current((scene->basact)->object) && (psys->edit || psys->pointcache->edit) && !psys->renderdata);
00260 }
00261 static void psys_create_frand(ParticleSystem *psys)
00262 {
00263     int i;
00264     float *rand = psys->frand = MEM_callocN(PSYS_FRAND_COUNT * sizeof(float), "particle randoms");
00265 
00266     BLI_srandom(psys->seed);
00267 
00268     for (i=0; i<1024; i++, rand++)
00269         *rand = BLI_frand();
00270 }
00271 int psys_check_enabled(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
00272 {
00273     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
00274 
00275     if (psys->flag & PSYS_DISABLED || psys->flag & PSYS_DELETE || !psys->part)
00276         return 0;
00277 
00278     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
00279     if (psys->renderdata || G.rendering) {
00280         if (!(psmd->modifier.mode & eModifierMode_Render))
00281             return 0;
00282     }
00283     else if (!(psmd->modifier.mode & eModifierMode_Realtime))
00284         return 0;
00285 
00286     /* perhaps not the perfect place, but we have to be sure the rands are there before usage */
00287     if (!psys->frand)
00288         psys_create_frand(psys);
00289     else if (psys->recalc & PSYS_RECALC_RESET) {
00290         MEM_freeN(psys->frand);
00291         psys_create_frand(psys);
00292     }
00293     
00294     return 1;
00295 }
00296 
00297 int psys_check_edited(ParticleSystem *psys)
00298 {
00299     if (psys->part && psys->part->type==PART_HAIR)
00300         return (psys->flag & PSYS_EDITED || (psys->edit && psys->edit->edited));
00301     else
00302         return (psys->pointcache->edit && psys->pointcache->edit->edited);
00303 }

00305 void psys_check_group_weights(ParticleSettings *part)
00306 {
00307     ParticleDupliWeight *dw, *tdw;
00308     GroupObject *go;
00309     int current = 0;
00310 
00311     if (part->ren_as == PART_DRAW_GR && part->dup_group && part->dup_group->gobject.first) {
00312         /* first remove all weights that don't have an object in the group */
00313         dw = part->dupliweights.first;
00314         while (dw) {
00315             if (!object_in_group(dw->ob, part->dup_group)) {
00316                 tdw = dw->next;
00317                 BLI_freelinkN(&part->dupliweights, dw);
00318                 dw = tdw;
00319             }
00320             else
00321                 dw = dw->next;
00322         }
00323 
00324         /* then add objects in the group to new list */
00325         go = part->dup_group->gobject.first;
00326         while (go) {
00327             dw = part->dupliweights.first;
00328             while (dw && dw->ob != go->ob)
00329                 dw = dw->next;
00330             
00331             if (!dw) {
00332                 dw = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ParticleDupliWeight), "ParticleDupliWeight");
00333                 dw->ob = go->ob;
00334                 dw->count = 1;
00335                 BLI_addtail(&part->dupliweights, dw);
00336             }
00337 
00338             go = go->next;  
00339         }
00340 
00341         dw = part->dupliweights.first;
00342         for (; dw; dw=dw->next) {
00343             if (dw->flag & PART_DUPLIW_CURRENT) {
00344                 current = 1;
00345                 break;
00346             }
00347         }
00348 
00349         if (!current) {
00350             dw = part->dupliweights.first;
00351             if (dw)
00352                 dw->flag |= PART_DUPLIW_CURRENT;
00353         }
00354     }
00355     else {
00356         BLI_freelistN(&part->dupliweights);
00357     }
00358 }
00359 int psys_uses_gravity(ParticleSimulationData *sim)
00360 {
00361     return sim->scene->physics_settings.flag & PHYS_GLOBAL_GRAVITY && sim->psys->part && sim->psys->part->effector_weights->global_gravity != 0.0f;
00362 }

00372 void psys_free_settings(ParticleSettings *part)
00373 {
00374     MTex *mtex;
00375     int a;
00376     BKE_free_animdata(&part->id);
00377     free_partdeflect(part->pd);
00378     free_partdeflect(part->pd2);
00379 
00380     if (part->effector_weights)
00381         MEM_freeN(part->effector_weights);
00382 
00383     BLI_freelistN(&part->dupliweights);
00384 
00385     boid_free_settings(part->boids);
00386     fluid_free_settings(part->fluid);
00387 
00388     for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
00389         mtex= part->mtex[a];
00390         if (mtex && mtex->tex) mtex->tex->id.us--;
00391         if (mtex) MEM_freeN(mtex);
00392     }
00393 }

00395 void free_hair(Object *UNUSED(ob), ParticleSystem *psys, int dynamics)
00396 {
00397     PARTICLE_P;
00398 
00399     LOOP_PARTICLES {
00400         if (pa->hair)
00401             MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
00402         pa->hair = NULL;
00403         pa->totkey = 0;
00404     }
00405 
00406     psys->flag &= ~PSYS_HAIR_DONE;
00407 
00408     if (psys->clmd) {
00409         if (dynamics) {
00410             BKE_ptcache_free_list(&psys->ptcaches);
00411             psys->clmd->point_cache = psys->pointcache = NULL;
00412             psys->clmd->ptcaches.first = psys->clmd->ptcaches.last = NULL;
00413 
00414             modifier_free((ModifierData*)psys->clmd);
00415             
00416             psys->clmd = NULL;
00417             psys->pointcache = BKE_ptcache_add(&psys->ptcaches);
00418         }
00419         else {
00420             cloth_free_modifier(psys->clmd);
00421         }
00422     }
00423 
00424     if (psys->hair_in_dm)
00425         psys->hair_in_dm->release(psys->hair_in_dm);
00426     psys->hair_in_dm = NULL;
00427 
00428     if (psys->hair_out_dm)
00429         psys->hair_out_dm->release(psys->hair_out_dm);
00430     psys->hair_out_dm = NULL;
00431 }
00432 void free_keyed_keys(ParticleSystem *psys)
00433 {
00434     PARTICLE_P;
00435 
00436     if (psys->part->type == PART_HAIR)
00437         return;
00438 
00439     if (psys->particles && psys->particles->keys) {
00440         MEM_freeN(psys->particles->keys);
00441 
00442         LOOP_PARTICLES {
00443             if (pa->keys) {
00444                 pa->keys= NULL;
00445                 pa->totkey= 0;
00446             }
00447         }
00448     }
00449 }
00450 static void free_child_path_cache(ParticleSystem *psys)
00451 {
00452     psys_free_path_cache_buffers(psys->childcache, &psys->childcachebufs);
00453     psys->childcache = NULL;
00454     psys->totchildcache = 0;
00455 }
00456 void psys_free_path_cache(ParticleSystem *psys, PTCacheEdit *edit)
00457 {
00458     if (edit) {
00459         psys_free_path_cache_buffers(edit->pathcache, &edit->pathcachebufs);
00460         edit->pathcache= NULL;
00461         edit->totcached= 0;
00462     }
00463     if (psys) {
00464         psys_free_path_cache_buffers(psys->pathcache, &psys->pathcachebufs);
00465         psys->pathcache= NULL;
00466         psys->totcached= 0;
00467 
00468         free_child_path_cache(psys);
00469     }
00470 }
00471 void psys_free_children(ParticleSystem *psys)
00472 {
00473     if (psys->child) {
00474         MEM_freeN(psys->child);

00477     }
00478 
00479     free_child_path_cache(psys);
00480 }
00481 void psys_free_particles(ParticleSystem *psys)
00482 {
00483     PARTICLE_P;
00484 
00485     if (psys->particles) {
00486         if (psys->part->type==PART_HAIR) {
00487             LOOP_PARTICLES {
00488                 if (pa->hair)
00489                     MEM_freeN(pa->hair);
00490             }
00491         }
00492         
00493         if (psys->particles->keys)
00494             MEM_freeN(psys->particles->keys);
00495         
00496         if (psys->particles->boid)
00497             MEM_freeN(psys->particles->boid);
00498 
00499         MEM_freeN(psys->particles);
00500         psys->particles= NULL;
00501         psys->totpart= 0;
00502     }
00503 }
00504 void psys_free_pdd(ParticleSystem *psys)
00505 {
00506     if (psys->pdd) {
00507         if (psys->pdd->cdata)
00508             MEM_freeN(psys->pdd->cdata);
00509         psys->pdd->cdata = NULL;
00510 
00511         if (psys->pdd->vdata)
00512             MEM_freeN(psys->pdd->vdata);
00513         psys->pdd->vdata = NULL;
00514 
00515         if (psys->pdd->ndata)
00516             MEM_freeN(psys->pdd->ndata);
00517         psys->pdd->ndata = NULL;
00518 
00519         if (psys->pdd->vedata)
00520             MEM_freeN(psys->pdd->vedata);
00521         psys->pdd->vedata = NULL;
00522 
00523         psys->pdd->totpoint = 0;
00524         psys->pdd->tot_vec_size = 0;
00525     }
00526 }
00527 /* free everything */
00528 void psys_free(Object *ob, ParticleSystem * psys)
00529 {   
00530     if (psys) {
00531         int nr = 0;
00532         ParticleSystem * tpsys;
00533         
00534         psys_free_path_cache(psys, NULL);
00535 
00536         free_hair(ob, psys, 1);
00537 
00538         psys_free_particles(psys);
00539 
00540         if (psys->edit && psys->free_edit)
00541             psys->free_edit(psys->edit);
00542 
00543         if (psys->child) {
00544             MEM_freeN(psys->child);
00545             psys->child = NULL;
00546             psys->totchild = 0;
00547         }
00548         
00549         // check if we are last non-visible particle system
00550         for (tpsys=ob->particlesystem.first; tpsys; tpsys=tpsys->next) {
00551             if (tpsys->part) {
00552                 if (ELEM(tpsys->part->ren_as,PART_DRAW_OB,PART_DRAW_GR)) {
00553                     nr++;
00554                     break;
00555                 }
00556             }
00557         }
00558         // clear do-not-draw-flag
00559         if (!nr)
00560             ob->transflag &= ~OB_DUPLIPARTS;
00561 
00562         if (psys->part) {
00563             psys->part->id.us--;        
00564             psys->part=NULL;
00565         }
00566 
00567         BKE_ptcache_free_list(&psys->ptcaches);
00568         psys->pointcache = NULL;
00569         
00570         BLI_freelistN(&psys->targets);
00571 
00572         BLI_bvhtree_free(psys->bvhtree);
00573         BLI_kdtree_free(psys->tree);
00574  
00575         if (psys->fluid_springs)
00576             MEM_freeN(psys->fluid_springs);
00577 
00578         pdEndEffectors(&psys->effectors);
00579 
00580         if (psys->frand)
00581             MEM_freeN(psys->frand);
00582 
00583         if (psys->pdd) {
00584             psys_free_pdd(psys);
00585             MEM_freeN(psys->pdd);
00586         }
00587 
00588         MEM_freeN(psys);
00589     }
00590 }

00592 /************************************************/
00593 /*          Rendering                           */
00594 /************************************************/
00595 /* these functions move away particle data and bring it back after
00596  * rendering, to make different render settings possible without
00597  * removing the previous data. this should be solved properly once */
00598 
00599 typedef struct ParticleRenderElem {
00600     int curchild, totchild, reduce;
00601     float lambda, t, scalemin, scalemax;
00602 } ParticleRenderElem;
00603 
00604 typedef struct ParticleRenderData {
00605     ChildParticle *child;
00606     ParticleCacheKey **pathcache;
00607     ParticleCacheKey **childcache;
00608     ListBase pathcachebufs, childcachebufs;
00609     int totchild, totcached, totchildcache;
00610     DerivedMesh *dm;
00611     int totdmvert, totdmedge, totdmface;
00612 
00613     float mat[4][4];
00614     float viewmat[4][4], winmat[4][4];
00615     int winx, winy;
00616 
00617     int dosimplify;
00618     int timeoffset;
00619     ParticleRenderElem *elems;
00620     int *origindex;
00621 } ParticleRenderData;
00622 
00623 static float psys_render_viewport_falloff(double rate, float dist, float width)
00624 {
00625     return pow(rate, dist/width);
00626 }
00627 
00628 static float psys_render_projected_area(ParticleSystem *psys, const float center[3], float area, double vprate, float *viewport)
00629 {
00630     ParticleRenderData *data= psys->renderdata;
00631     float co[4], view[3], ortho1[3], ortho2[3], w, dx, dy, radius;
00632     
00633     /* transform to view space */
00634     copy_v3_v3(co, center);
00635     co[3]= 1.0f;
00636     mul_m4_v4(data->viewmat, co);
00637     
00638     /* compute two vectors orthogonal to view vector */
00639     normalize_v3_v3(view, co);
00640     ortho_basis_v3v3_v3( ortho1, ortho2,view);
00641 
00642     /* compute on screen minification */
00643     w= co[2]*data->winmat[2][3] + data->winmat[3][3];
00644     dx= data->winx*ortho2[0]*data->winmat[0][0];
00645     dy= data->winy*ortho2[1]*data->winmat[1][1];
00646     w= sqrtf(dx*dx + dy*dy)/w;
00647 
00648     /* w squared because we are working with area */
00649     area= area*w*w;
00650 
00651     /* viewport of the screen test */
00652 
00653     /* project point on screen */
00654     mul_m4_v4(data->winmat, co);
00655     if (co[3] != 0.0f) {
00656         co[0]= 0.5f*data->winx*(1.0f + co[0]/co[3]);
00657         co[1]= 0.5f*data->winy*(1.0f + co[1]/co[3]);
00658     }
00659 
00660     /* screen space radius */
00661     radius= sqrt(area/(float)M_PI);
00662 
00663     /* make smaller using fallof once over screen edge */
00664     *viewport= 1.0f;
00665 
00666     if (co[0]+radius < 0.0f)
00667         *viewport *= psys_render_viewport_falloff(vprate, -(co[0]+radius), data->winx);
00668     else if (co[0]-radius > data->winx)
00669         *viewport *= psys_render_viewport_falloff(vprate, (co[0]-radius) - data->winx, data->winx);
00670 
00671     if (co[1]+radius < 0.0f)
00672         *viewport *= psys_render_viewport_falloff(vprate, -(co[1]+radius), data->winy);
00673     else if (co[1]-radius > data->winy)
00674         *viewport *= psys_render_viewport_falloff(vprate, (co[1]-radius) - data->winy, data->winy);
00675     
00676     return area;
00677 }
00678 
00679 void psys_render_set(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys, float viewmat[][4], float winmat[][4], int winx, int winy, int timeoffset)
00680 {
00681     ParticleRenderData*data;
00682     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
00683 
00684     if (!G.rendering)
00685         return;
00686     if (psys->renderdata)
00687         return;
00688 
00689     data= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ParticleRenderData), "ParticleRenderData");
00690 
00691     data->child= psys->child;
00692     data->totchild= psys->totchild;
00693     data->pathcache= psys->pathcache;
00694     data->pathcachebufs.first = psys->pathcachebufs.first;
00695     data->pathcachebufs.last = psys->pathcachebufs.last;
00696     data->totcached= psys->totcached;
00697     data->childcache= psys->childcache;
00698     data->childcachebufs.first = psys->childcachebufs.first;
00699     data->childcachebufs.last = psys->childcachebufs.last;
00700     data->totchildcache= psys->totchildcache;
00701 
00702     if (psmd->dm)
00703         data->dm= CDDM_copy(psmd->dm);
00704     data->totdmvert= psmd->totdmvert;
00705     data->totdmedge= psmd->totdmedge;
00706     data->totdmface= psmd->totdmface;
00707 
00708     psys->child= NULL;
00709     psys->pathcache= NULL;
00710     psys->childcache= NULL;
00711     psys->totchild= psys->totcached= psys->totchildcache= 0;
00712     psys->pathcachebufs.first = psys->pathcachebufs.last = NULL;
00713     psys->childcachebufs.first = psys->childcachebufs.last = NULL;
00714 
00715     copy_m4_m4(data->winmat, winmat);
00716     mult_m4_m4m4(data->viewmat, viewmat, ob->obmat);
00717     mult_m4_m4m4(data->mat, winmat, data->viewmat);
00718     data->winx= winx;
00719     data->winy= winy;
00720 
00721     data->timeoffset= timeoffset;
00722 
00723     psys->renderdata= data;
00724 
00725     /* Hair can and has to be recalculated if everything isn't displayed. */
00726     if (psys->part->disp != 100 && psys->part->type == PART_HAIR)
00727         psys->recalc |= PSYS_RECALC_RESET;
00728 }
00729 
00730 void psys_render_restore(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
00731 {
00732     ParticleRenderData*data;
00733     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
00734 
00735     data= psys->renderdata;
00736     if (!data)
00737         return;
00738     
00739     if (data->elems)
00740         MEM_freeN(data->elems);
00741 
00742     if (psmd->dm) {
00743         psmd->dm->needsFree= 1;
00744         psmd->dm->release(psmd->dm);
00745     }
00746 
00747     psys_free_path_cache(psys, NULL);
00748 
00749     if (psys->child) {
00750         MEM_freeN(psys->child);
00751         psys->child= 0;
00752         psys->totchild= 0;
00753     }
00754 
00755     psys->child= data->child;
00756     psys->totchild= data->totchild;
00757     psys->pathcache= data->pathcache;
00758     psys->pathcachebufs.first = data->pathcachebufs.first;
00759     psys->pathcachebufs.last = data->pathcachebufs.last;
00760     psys->totcached= data->totcached;
00761     psys->childcache= data->childcache;
00762     psys->childcachebufs.first = data->childcachebufs.first;
00763     psys->childcachebufs.last = data->childcachebufs.last;
00764     psys->totchildcache= data->totchildcache;
00765 
00766     psmd->dm= data->dm;
00767     psmd->totdmvert= data->totdmvert;
00768     psmd->totdmedge= data->totdmedge;
00769     psmd->totdmface= data->totdmface;
00770     psmd->flag &= ~eParticleSystemFlag_psys_updated;
00771 
00772     if (psmd->dm)
00773         psys_calc_dmcache(ob, psmd->dm, psys);
00774 
00775     MEM_freeN(data);
00776     psys->renderdata= NULL;
00777 }
00778 
00779 /* BMESH_TODO, for orig face data, we need to use MPoly */
00780 
00781 int psys_render_simplify_distribution(ParticleThreadContext *ctx, int tot)
00782 {
00783     DerivedMesh *dm= ctx->dm;
00784     Mesh *me= (Mesh*)(ctx->sim.ob->data);
00785     MFace *mf, *mface;
00786     MVert *mvert;
00787     ParticleRenderData *data;
00788     ParticleRenderElem *elems, *elem;
00789     ParticleSettings *part= ctx->sim.psys->part;
00790     float *facearea, (*facecenter)[3], size[3], fac, powrate, scaleclamp;
00791     float co1[3], co2[3], co3[3], co4[3], lambda, arearatio, t, area, viewport;
00792     double vprate;
00793     int *origindex, *facetotvert;
00794     int a, b, totorigface, totface, newtot, skipped;
00795 
00796     if (part->ren_as!=PART_DRAW_PATH || !(part->draw & PART_DRAW_REN_STRAND))
00797         return tot;
00798     if (!ctx->sim.psys->renderdata)
00799         return tot;
00800 
00801     data= ctx->sim.psys->renderdata;
00802     if (data->timeoffset)
00803         return 0;
00804     if (!(part->simplify_flag & PART_SIMPLIFY_ENABLE))
00805         return tot;
00806 
00807     mvert= dm->getVertArray(dm);
00808     mface= dm->getTessFaceArray(dm);
00809     origindex= dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
00810     totface= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
00811     totorigface= me->totpoly;
00812 
00813     if (totface == 0 || totorigface == 0)
00814         return tot;
00815 
00816     facearea= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*totorigface, "SimplifyFaceArea");
00817     facecenter= MEM_callocN(sizeof(float[3])*totorigface, "SimplifyFaceCenter");
00818     facetotvert= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*totorigface, "SimplifyFaceArea");
00819     elems= MEM_callocN(sizeof(ParticleRenderElem)*totorigface, "SimplifyFaceElem");
00820 
00821     if (data->elems)
00822         MEM_freeN(data->elems);
00823 
00824     data->dosimplify= 1;
00825     data->elems= elems;
00826     data->origindex= origindex;
00827 
00828     /* compute number of children per original face */
00829     for (a=0; a<tot; a++) {
00830         b= (origindex)? origindex[ctx->index[a]]: ctx->index[a];
00831         if (b != -1)
00832             elems[b].totchild++;
00833     }
00834 
00835     /* compute areas and centers of original faces */
00836     for (mf=mface, a=0; a<totface; a++, mf++) {
00837         b= (origindex)? origindex[a]: a;
00838 
00839         if (b != -1) {
00840             copy_v3_v3(co1, mvert[mf->v1].co);
00841             copy_v3_v3(co2, mvert[mf->v2].co);
00842             copy_v3_v3(co3, mvert[mf->v3].co);
00843 
00844             add_v3_v3(facecenter[b], co1);
00845             add_v3_v3(facecenter[b], co2);
00846             add_v3_v3(facecenter[b], co3);
00847 
00848             if (mf->v4) {
00849                 copy_v3_v3(co4, mvert[mf->v4].co);
00850                 add_v3_v3(facecenter[b], co4);
00851                 facearea[b] += area_quad_v3(co1, co2, co3, co4);
00852                 facetotvert[b] += 4;
00853             }
00854             else {
00855                 facearea[b] += area_tri_v3(co1, co2, co3);
00856                 facetotvert[b] += 3;
00857             }
00858         }
00859     }
00860 
00861     for (a=0; a<totorigface; a++)
00862         if (facetotvert[a] > 0)
00863             mul_v3_fl(facecenter[a], 1.0f/facetotvert[a]);
00864 
00865     /* for conversion from BU area / pixel area to reference screen size */
00866     mesh_get_texspace(me, 0, 0, size);
00867     fac= ((size[0] + size[1] + size[2])/3.0f)/part->simplify_refsize;
00868     fac= fac*fac;
00869 
00870     powrate= log(0.5f)/log(part->simplify_rate*0.5f);
00871     if (part->simplify_flag & PART_SIMPLIFY_VIEWPORT)
00872         vprate= pow(1.0f - part->simplify_viewport, 5.0);
00873     else
00874         vprate= 1.0;
00875 
00876     /* set simplification parameters per original face */
00877     for (a=0, elem=elems; a<totorigface; a++, elem++) {
00878         area = psys_render_projected_area(ctx->sim.psys, facecenter[a], facearea[a], vprate, &viewport);
00879         arearatio= fac*area/facearea[a];
00880 
00881         if ((arearatio < 1.0f || viewport < 1.0f) && elem->totchild) {
00882             /* lambda is percentage of elements to keep */
00883             lambda= (arearatio < 1.0f)? powf(arearatio, powrate): 1.0f;
00884             lambda *= viewport;
00885 
00886             lambda= MAX2(lambda, 1.0f/elem->totchild);
00887 
00888             /* compute transition region */
00889             t= part->simplify_transition;
00890             elem->t= (lambda-t < 0.0f)? lambda: (lambda+t > 1.0f)? 1.0f-lambda: t;
00891             elem->reduce= 1;
00892 
00893             /* scale at end and beginning of the transition region */
00894             elem->scalemax= (lambda+t < 1.0f)? 1.0f/lambda: 1.0f/(1.0f - elem->t*elem->t/t);
00895             elem->scalemin= (lambda+t < 1.0f)? 0.0f: elem->scalemax*(1.0f-elem->t/t);
00896 
00897             elem->scalemin= sqrt(elem->scalemin);
00898             elem->scalemax= sqrt(elem->scalemax);
00899 
00900             /* clamp scaling */
00901             scaleclamp= MIN2(elem->totchild, 10.0f);
00902             elem->scalemin= MIN2(scaleclamp, elem->scalemin);
00903             elem->scalemax= MIN2(scaleclamp, elem->scalemax);
00904 
00905             /* extend lambda to include transition */
00906             lambda= lambda + elem->t;
00907             if (lambda > 1.0f)
00908                 lambda= 1.0f;
00909         }
00910         else {
00911             lambda= arearatio;
00912 
00913             elem->scalemax= 1.0f; //sqrt(lambda);
00914             elem->scalemin= 1.0f; //sqrt(lambda);
00915             elem->reduce= 0;
00916         }
00917 
00918         elem->lambda= lambda;
00919         elem->scalemin= sqrt(elem->scalemin);
00920         elem->scalemax= sqrt(elem->scalemax);
00921         elem->curchild= 0;
00922     }
00923 
00924     MEM_freeN(facearea);
00925     MEM_freeN(facecenter);
00926     MEM_freeN(facetotvert);
00927 
00928     /* move indices and set random number skipping */
00929     ctx->skip= MEM_callocN(sizeof(int)*tot, "SimplificationSkip");
00930 
00931     skipped= 0;
00932     for (a=0, newtot=0; a<tot; a++) {
00933         b= (origindex)? origindex[ctx->index[a]]: ctx->index[a];
00934         if (b != -1) {
00935             if (elems[b].curchild++ < ceil(elems[b].lambda*elems[b].totchild)) {
00936                 ctx->index[newtot]= ctx->index[a];
00937                 ctx->skip[newtot]= skipped;
00938                 skipped= 0;
00939                 newtot++;
00940             }
00941             else skipped++;
00942         }
00943         else skipped++;
00944     }
00945 
00946     for (a=0, elem=elems; a<totorigface; a++, elem++)
00947         elem->curchild= 0;
00948 
00949     return newtot;
00950 }
00951 
00952 int psys_render_simplify_params(ParticleSystem *psys, ChildParticle *cpa, float *params)
00953 {
00954     ParticleRenderData *data;
00955     ParticleRenderElem *elem;
00956     float x, w, scale, alpha, lambda, t, scalemin, scalemax;
00957     int b;
00958 
00959     if (!(psys->renderdata && (psys->part->simplify_flag & PART_SIMPLIFY_ENABLE)))
00960         return 0;
00961     
00962     data= psys->renderdata;
00963     if (!data->dosimplify)
00964         return 0;
00965     
00966     b= (data->origindex)? data->origindex[cpa->num]: cpa->num;
00967     if (b == -1)
00968         return 0;
00969 
00970     elem= &data->elems[b];
00971 
00972     lambda= elem->lambda;
00973     t= elem->t;
00974     scalemin= elem->scalemin;
00975     scalemax= elem->scalemax;
00976 
00977     if (!elem->reduce) {
00978         scale= scalemin;
00979         alpha= 1.0f;
00980     }
00981     else {
00982         x= (elem->curchild+0.5f)/elem->totchild;
00983         if (x < lambda-t) {
00984             scale= scalemax;
00985             alpha= 1.0f;
00986         }
00987         else if (x >= lambda+t) {
00988             scale= scalemin;
00989             alpha= 0.0f;
00990         }
00991         else {
00992             w= (lambda+t - x)/(2.0f*t);
00993             scale= scalemin + (scalemax - scalemin)*w;
00994             alpha= w;
00995         }
00996     }
00997 
00998     params[0]= scale;
00999     params[1]= alpha;
01000 
01001     elem->curchild++;
01002 
01003     return 1;
01004 }
01005 
01006 /************************************************/
01007 /*          Interpolation                       */
01008 /************************************************/
01009 static float interpolate_particle_value(float v1, float v2, float v3, float v4, const float w[4], int four)
01010 {
01011     float value;
01012 
01013     value= w[0]*v1 + w[1]*v2 + w[2]*v3;
01014     if (four)
01015         value += w[3]*v4;
01016 
01017     CLAMP(value, 0.f, 1.f);
01018     
01019     return value;
01020 }
01021 
01022 void psys_interpolate_particle(short type, ParticleKey keys[4], float dt, ParticleKey *result, int velocity)
01023 {
01024     float t[4];
01025 
01026     if (type<0) {
01027         interp_cubic_v3( result->co, result->vel,keys[1].co, keys[1].vel, keys[2].co, keys[2].vel, dt);
01028     }
01029     else {
01030         key_curve_position_weights(dt, t, type);
01031 
01032         interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(result->co, keys[0].co, keys[1].co, keys[2].co, keys[3].co, t);
01033 
01034         if (velocity) {
01035             float temp[3];
01036 
01037             if (dt>0.999f) {
01038                 key_curve_position_weights(dt-0.001f, t, type);
01039                 interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(temp, keys[0].co, keys[1].co, keys[2].co, keys[3].co, t);
01040                 sub_v3_v3v3(result->vel, result->co, temp);
01041             }
01042             else {
01043                 key_curve_position_weights(dt+0.001f, t, type);
01044                 interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(temp, keys[0].co, keys[1].co, keys[2].co, keys[3].co, t);
01045                 sub_v3_v3v3(result->vel, temp, result->co);
01046             }
01047         }
01048     }
01049 }
01050 
01051 
01052 
01053 typedef struct ParticleInterpolationData {
01054     HairKey *hkey[2];
01055 
01056     DerivedMesh *dm;
01057     MVert *mvert[2];
01058 
01059     int keyed;
01060     ParticleKey *kkey[2];
01061 
01062     PointCache *cache;
01063     PTCacheMem *pm;
01064 
01065     PTCacheEditPoint *epoint;
01066     PTCacheEditKey *ekey[2];
01067 
01068     float birthtime, dietime;
01069     int bspline;
01070 } ParticleInterpolationData;
01071 /* Assumes pointcache->mem_cache exists, so for disk cached particles call psys_make_temp_pointcache() before use */
01072 /* It uses ParticleInterpolationData->pm to store the current memory cache frame so it's thread safe. */
01073 static void get_pointcache_keys_for_time(Object *UNUSED(ob), PointCache *cache, PTCacheMem **cur, int index, float t, ParticleKey *key1, ParticleKey *key2)
01074 {
01075     static PTCacheMem *pm = NULL;
01076     int index1, index2;
01077 
01078     if (index < 0) { /* initialize */
01079         *cur = cache->mem_cache.first;
01080 
01081         if (*cur)
01082             *cur = (*cur)->next;
01083     }
01084     else {
01085         if (*cur) {
01086             while (*cur && (*cur)->next && (float)(*cur)->frame < t)
01087                 *cur = (*cur)->next;
01088 
01089             pm = *cur;
01090 
01091             index2 = BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm, index);
01092             index1 = BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm->prev, index);
01093 
01094             BKE_ptcache_make_particle_key(key2, index2, pm->data, (float)pm->frame);
01095             if (index1 < 0)
01096                 copy_particle_key(key1, key2, 1);
01097             else
01098                 BKE_ptcache_make_particle_key(key1, index1, pm->prev->data, (float)pm->prev->frame);
01099         }
01100         else if (cache->mem_cache.first) {
01101             pm = cache->mem_cache.first;
01102             index2 = BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm, index);
01103             BKE_ptcache_make_particle_key(key2, index2, pm->data, (float)pm->frame);
01104             copy_particle_key(key1, key2, 1);
01105         }
01106     }
01107 }
01108 static int get_pointcache_times_for_particle(PointCache *cache, int index, float *start, float *end)
01109 {
01110     PTCacheMem *pm;
01111     int ret = 0;
01112 
01113     for (pm=cache->mem_cache.first; pm; pm=pm->next) {
01114         if (BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm, index) >= 0) {
01115             *start = pm->frame;
01116             ret++;
01117             break;
01118         }
01119     }
01120 
01121     for (pm=cache->mem_cache.last; pm; pm=pm->prev) {
01122         if (BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm, index) >= 0) {
01123             *end = pm->frame;
01124             ret++;
01125             break;
01126         }
01127     }
01128 
01129     return ret == 2;
01130 }
01131 
01132 float psys_get_dietime_from_cache(PointCache *cache, int index)
01133 {
01134     PTCacheMem *pm;
01135     int dietime = 10000000; /* some max value so that we can default to pa->time+lifetime */
01136 
01137     for (pm=cache->mem_cache.last; pm; pm=pm->prev) {
01138         if (BKE_ptcache_mem_index_find(pm, index) >= 0)
01139             return (float)pm->frame;
01140     }
01141 
01142     return (float)dietime;
01143 }
01144 
01145 static void init_particle_interpolation(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys, ParticleData *pa, ParticleInterpolationData *pind)
01146 {
01147 
01148     if (pind->epoint) {
01149         PTCacheEditPoint *point = pind->epoint;
01150 
01151         pind->ekey[0] = point->keys;
01152         pind->ekey[1] = point->totkey > 1 ? point->keys + 1 : NULL;
01153 
01154         pind->birthtime = *(point->keys->time);
01155         pind->dietime = *((point->keys + point->totkey - 1)->time);
01156     }
01157     else if (pind->keyed) {
01158         ParticleKey *key = pa->keys;
01159         pind->kkey[0] = key;
01160         pind->kkey[1] = pa->totkey > 1 ? key + 1 : NULL;
01161 
01162         pind->birthtime = key->time;
01163         pind->dietime = (key + pa->totkey - 1)->time;
01164     }
01165     else if (pind->cache) {
01166         float start=0.0f, end=0.0f;
01167         get_pointcache_keys_for_time(ob, pind->cache, &pind->pm, -1, 0.0f, NULL, NULL);
01168         pind->birthtime = pa ? pa->time : pind->cache->startframe;
01169         pind->dietime = pa ? pa->dietime : pind->cache->endframe;
01170 
01171         if (get_pointcache_times_for_particle(pind->cache, pa - psys->particles, &start, &end)) {
01172             pind->birthtime = MAX2(pind->birthtime, start);
01173             pind->dietime = MIN2(pind->dietime, end);
01174         }
01175     }
01176     else {
01177         HairKey *key = pa->hair;
01178         pind->hkey[0] = key;
01179         pind->hkey[1] = key + 1;
01180 
01181         pind->birthtime = key->time;
01182         pind->dietime = (key + pa->totkey - 1)->time;
01183 
01184         if (pind->dm) {
01185             pind->mvert[0] = CDDM_get_vert(pind->dm, pa->hair_index);
01186             pind->mvert[1] = pind->mvert[0] + 1;
01187         }
01188     }
01189 }
01190 static void edit_to_particle(ParticleKey *key, PTCacheEditKey *ekey)
01191 {
01192     copy_v3_v3(key->co, ekey->co);
01193     if (ekey->vel) {
01194         copy_v3_v3(key->vel, ekey->vel);
01195     }
01196     key->time = *(ekey->time);
01197 }
01198 static void hair_to_particle(ParticleKey *key, HairKey *hkey)
01199 {
01200     copy_v3_v3(key->co, hkey->co);
01201     key->time = hkey->time;
01202 }
01203 
01204 static void mvert_to_particle(ParticleKey *key, MVert *mvert, HairKey *hkey)
01205 {
01206     copy_v3_v3(key->co, mvert->co);
01207     key->time = hkey->time;
01208 }
01209 
01210 static void do_particle_interpolation(ParticleSystem *psys, int p, ParticleData *pa, float t, ParticleInterpolationData *pind, ParticleKey *result)
01211 {
01212     PTCacheEditPoint *point = pind->epoint;
01213     ParticleKey keys[4];
01214     int point_vel = (point && point->keys->vel);
01215     float real_t, dfra, keytime, invdt = 1.f;
01216 
01217     /* billboards wont fill in all of these, so start cleared */
01218     memset(keys, 0, sizeof(keys));
01219 
01220     /* interpret timing and find keys */
01221     if (point) {
01222         if (result->time < 0.0f)
01223             real_t = -result->time;
01224         else
01225             real_t = *(pind->ekey[0]->time) + t * (*(pind->ekey[0][point->totkey-1].time) - *(pind->ekey[0]->time));
01226 
01227         while (*(pind->ekey[1]->time) < real_t)
01228             pind->ekey[1]++;
01229 
01230         pind->ekey[0] = pind->ekey[1] - 1;
01231     }
01232     else if (pind->keyed) {
01233         /* we have only one key, so let's use that */
01234         if (pind->kkey[1]==NULL) {
01235             copy_particle_key(result, pind->kkey[0], 1);
01236             return;
01237         }
01238 
01239         if (result->time < 0.0f)
01240             real_t = -result->time;
01241         else
01242             real_t = pind->kkey[0]->time + t * (pind->kkey[0][pa->totkey-1].time - pind->kkey[0]->time);
01243 
01244         if (psys->part->phystype==PART_PHYS_KEYED && psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED_TIMING) {
01245             ParticleTarget *pt = psys->targets.first;
01246 
01247             pt=pt->next;
01248 
01249             while (pt && pa->time + pt->time < real_t)
01250                 pt= pt->next;
01251 
01252             if (pt) {
01253                 pt=pt->prev;
01254 
01255                 if (pa->time + pt->time + pt->duration > real_t)
01256                     real_t = pa->time + pt->time;
01257             }
01258             else
01259                 real_t = pa->time + ((ParticleTarget*)psys->targets.last)->time;
01260         }
01261 
01262         CLAMP(real_t, pa->time, pa->dietime);
01263 
01264         while (pind->kkey[1]->time < real_t)
01265             pind->kkey[1]++;
01266         
01267         pind->kkey[0] = pind->kkey[1] - 1;
01268     }
01269     else if (pind->cache) {
01270         if (result->time < 0.0f) /* flag for time in frames */
01271             real_t = -result->time;
01272         else
01273             real_t = pa->time + t * (pa->dietime - pa->time);
01274     }
01275     else {
01276         if (result->time < 0.0f)
01277             real_t = -result->time;
01278         else
01279             real_t = pind->hkey[0]->time + t * (pind->hkey[0][pa->totkey-1].time - pind->hkey[0]->time);
01280 
01281         while (pind->hkey[1]->time < real_t) {
01282             pind->hkey[1]++;
01283             pind->mvert[1]++;
01284         }
01285 
01286         pind->hkey[0] = pind->hkey[1] - 1;
01287     }
01288 
01289     /* set actual interpolation keys */
01290     if (point) {
01291         edit_to_particle(keys + 1, pind->ekey[0]);
01292         edit_to_particle(keys + 2, pind->ekey[1]);
01293     }
01294     else if (pind->dm) {
01295         pind->mvert[0] = pind->mvert[1] - 1;
01296         mvert_to_particle(keys + 1, pind->mvert[0], pind->hkey[0]);
01297         mvert_to_particle(keys + 2, pind->mvert[1], pind->hkey[1]);
01298     }
01299     else if (pind->keyed) {
01300         memcpy(keys + 1, pind->kkey[0], sizeof(ParticleKey));
01301         memcpy(keys + 2, pind->kkey[1], sizeof(ParticleKey));
01302     }
01303     else if (pind->cache) {
01304         get_pointcache_keys_for_time(NULL, pind->cache, &pind->pm, p, real_t, keys+1, keys+2);
01305     }
01306     else {
01307         hair_to_particle(keys + 1, pind->hkey[0]);
01308         hair_to_particle(keys + 2, pind->hkey[1]);
01309     }
01310 
01311     /* set secondary interpolation keys for hair */
01312     if (!pind->keyed && !pind->cache && !point_vel) {
01313         if (point) {
01314             if (pind->ekey[0] != point->keys)
01315                 edit_to_particle(keys, pind->ekey[0] - 1);
01316             else
01317                 edit_to_particle(keys, pind->ekey[0]);
01318         }
01319         else if (pind->dm) {
01320             if (pind->hkey[0] != pa->hair)
01321                 mvert_to_particle(keys, pind->mvert[0] - 1, pind->hkey[0] - 1);
01322             else
01323                 mvert_to_particle(keys, pind->mvert[0], pind->hkey[0]);
01324         }
01325         else {
01326             if (pind->hkey[0] != pa->hair)
01327                 hair_to_particle(keys, pind->hkey[0] - 1);
01328             else
01329                 hair_to_particle(keys, pind->hkey[0]);
01330         }
01331 
01332         if (point) {
01333             if (pind->ekey[1] != point->keys + point->totkey - 1)
01334                 edit_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->ekey[1] + 1);
01335             else
01336                 edit_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->ekey[1]);
01337         }
01338         else if (pind->dm) {
01339             if (pind->hkey[1] != pa->hair + pa->totkey - 1)
01340                 mvert_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->mvert[1] + 1, pind->hkey[1] + 1);
01341             else
01342                 mvert_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->mvert[1], pind->hkey[1]);
01343         }
01344         else {
01345             if (pind->hkey[1] != pa->hair + pa->totkey - 1)
01346                 hair_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->hkey[1] + 1);
01347             else
01348                 hair_to_particle(keys + 3, pind->hkey[1]);
01349         }
01350     }
01351 
01352     dfra = keys[2].time - keys[1].time;
01353     keytime = (real_t - keys[1].time) / dfra;
01354 
01355     /* convert velocity to timestep size */
01356     if (pind->keyed || pind->cache || point_vel) {
01357         invdt = dfra * 0.04f * (psys ? psys->part->timetweak : 1.f);
01358         mul_v3_fl(keys[1].vel, invdt);
01359         mul_v3_fl(keys[2].vel, invdt);
01360         interp_qt_qtqt(result->rot,keys[1].rot,keys[2].rot,keytime);
01361     }
01362 
01363     /* now we should have in chronologiacl order k1<=k2<=t<=k3<=k4 with keytime between [0,1]->[k2,k3] (k1 & k4 used for cardinal & bspline interpolation)*/
01364     psys_interpolate_particle((pind->keyed || pind->cache || point_vel) ? -1 /* signal for cubic interpolation */
01365         : (pind->bspline ? KEY_BSPLINE : KEY_CARDINAL)
01366         ,keys, keytime, result, 1);
01367 
01368     /* the velocity needs to be converted back from cubic interpolation */
01369     if (pind->keyed || pind->cache || point_vel)
01370         mul_v3_fl(result->vel, 1.f/invdt);
01371 }
01372 
01373 static void interpolate_pathcache(ParticleCacheKey *first, float t, ParticleCacheKey *result)
01374 {
01375     int i=0;
01376     ParticleCacheKey *cur = first;
01377 
01378     /* scale the requested time to fit the entire path even if the path is cut early */
01379     t *= (first+first->steps)->time;
01380 
01381     while (i<first->steps && cur->time < t)
01382         cur++;
01383 
01384     if (cur->time == t)
01385         *result = *cur;
01386     else {
01387         float dt = (t-(cur-1)->time)/(cur->time-(cur-1)->time);
01388         interp_v3_v3v3(result->co, (cur-1)->co, cur->co, dt);
01389         interp_v3_v3v3(result->vel, (cur-1)->vel, cur->vel, dt);
01390         interp_qt_qtqt(result->rot, (cur-1)->rot, cur->rot, dt);
01391         result->time = t;
01392     }
01393 
01394     /* first is actual base rotation, others are incremental from first */
01395     if (cur==first || cur-1==first)
01396         copy_qt_qt(result->rot, first->rot);
01397     else
01398         mul_qt_qtqt(result->rot, first->rot, result->rot);
01399 }
01400 
01401 /************************************************/
01402 /*          Particles on a dm                   */
01403 /************************************************/
01404 /* interpolate a location on a face based on face coordinates */
01405 void psys_interpolate_face(MVert *mvert, MFace *mface, MTFace *tface, float (*orcodata)[3],
01406                            float *w, float *vec, float *nor, float *utan, float *vtan, float *orco,float *ornor)
01407 {
01408     float *v1=0, *v2=0, *v3=0, *v4=0;
01409     float e1[3],e2[3],s1,s2,t1,t2;
01410     float *uv1, *uv2, *uv3, *uv4;
01411     float n1[3], n2[3], n3[3], n4[3];
01412     float tuv[4][2];
01413     float *o1, *o2, *o3, *o4;
01414 
01415     v1= mvert[mface->v1].co;
01416     v2= mvert[mface->v2].co;
01417     v3= mvert[mface->v3].co;
01418 
01419     normal_short_to_float_v3(n1, mvert[mface->v1].no);
01420     normal_short_to_float_v3(n2, mvert[mface->v2].no);
01421     normal_short_to_float_v3(n3, mvert[mface->v3].no);
01422 
01423     if (mface->v4) {
01424         v4= mvert[mface->v4].co;
01425         normal_short_to_float_v3(n4, mvert[mface->v4].no);
01426         
01427         interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(vec, v1, v2, v3, v4, w);
01428 
01429         if (nor) {
01430             if (mface->flag & ME_SMOOTH)
01431                 interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(nor, n1, n2, n3, n4, w);
01432             else
01433                 normal_quad_v3(nor,v1,v2,v3,v4);
01434         }
01435     }
01436     else {
01437         interp_v3_v3v3v3(vec, v1, v2, v3, w);
01438 
01439         if (nor) {
01440             if (mface->flag & ME_SMOOTH)
01441                 interp_v3_v3v3v3(nor, n1, n2, n3, w);
01442             else
01443                 normal_tri_v3(nor,v1,v2,v3);
01444         }
01445     }
01446     
01447     /* calculate tangent vectors */
01448     if (utan && vtan) {
01449         if (tface) {
01450             uv1= tface->uv[0];
01451             uv2= tface->uv[1];
01452             uv3= tface->uv[2];
01453             uv4= tface->uv[3];
01454         }
01455         else {
01456             uv1= tuv[0]; uv2= tuv[1]; uv3= tuv[2]; uv4= tuv[3];
01457             map_to_sphere( uv1, uv1+1,v1[0], v1[1], v1[2]);
01458             map_to_sphere( uv2, uv2+1,v2[0], v2[1], v2[2]);
01459             map_to_sphere( uv3, uv3+1,v3[0], v3[1], v3[2]);
01460             if (v4)
01461                 map_to_sphere( uv4, uv4+1,v4[0], v4[1], v4[2]);
01462         }
01463 
01464         if (v4) {
01465             s1= uv3[0] - uv1[0];
01466             s2= uv4[0] - uv1[0];
01467 
01468             t1= uv3[1] - uv1[1];
01469             t2= uv4[1] - uv1[1];
01470 
01471             sub_v3_v3v3(e1, v3, v1);
01472             sub_v3_v3v3(e2, v4, v1);
01473         }
01474         else {
01475             s1= uv2[0] - uv1[0];
01476             s2= uv3[0] - uv1[0];
01477 
01478             t1= uv2[1] - uv1[1];
01479             t2= uv3[1] - uv1[1];
01480 
01481             sub_v3_v3v3(e1, v2, v1);
01482             sub_v3_v3v3(e2, v3, v1);
01483         }
01484 
01485         vtan[0] = (s1*e2[0] - s2*e1[0]);
01486         vtan[1] = (s1*e2[1] - s2*e1[1]);
01487         vtan[2] = (s1*e2[2] - s2*e1[2]);
01488 
01489         utan[0] = (t1*e2[0] - t2*e1[0]);
01490         utan[1] = (t1*e2[1] - t2*e1[1]);
01491         utan[2] = (t1*e2[2] - t2*e1[2]);
01492     }
01493 
01494     if (orco) {
01495         if (orcodata) {
01496             o1= orcodata[mface->v1];
01497             o2= orcodata[mface->v2];
01498             o3= orcodata[mface->v3];
01499 
01500             if (mface->v4) {
01501                 o4= orcodata[mface->v4];
01502 
01503                 interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(orco, o1, o2, o3, o4, w);
01504 
01505                 if (ornor)
01506                     normal_quad_v3( ornor,o1, o2, o3, o4);
01507             }
01508             else {
01509                 interp_v3_v3v3v3(orco, o1, o2, o3, w);
01510 
01511                 if (ornor)
01512                     normal_tri_v3( ornor,o1, o2, o3);
01513             }
01514         }
01515         else {
01516             copy_v3_v3(orco, vec);
01517             if (ornor && nor)
01518                 copy_v3_v3(ornor, nor);
01519         }
01520     }
01521 }
01522 void psys_interpolate_uvs(const MTFace *tface, int quad, const float w[4], float uvco[2])
01523 {
01524     float v10= tface->uv[0][0];
01525     float v11= tface->uv[0][1];
01526     float v20= tface->uv[1][0];
01527     float v21= tface->uv[1][1];
01528     float v30= tface->uv[2][0];
01529     float v31= tface->uv[2][1];
01530     float v40,v41;
01531 
01532     if (quad) {
01533         v40= tface->uv[3][0];
01534         v41= tface->uv[3][1];
01535 
01536         uvco[0]= w[0]*v10 + w[1]*v20 + w[2]*v30 + w[3]*v40;
01537         uvco[1]= w[0]*v11 + w[1]*v21 + w[2]*v31 + w[3]*v41;
01538     }
01539     else {
01540         uvco[0]= w[0]*v10 + w[1]*v20 + w[2]*v30;
01541         uvco[1]= w[0]*v11 + w[1]*v21 + w[2]*v31;
01542     }
01543 }
01544 
01545 void psys_interpolate_mcol(const MCol *mcol, int quad, const float w[4], MCol *mc)
01546 {
01547     char *cp, *cp1, *cp2, *cp3, *cp4;
01548 
01549     cp= (char *)mc;
01550     cp1= (char *)&mcol[0];
01551     cp2= (char *)&mcol[1];
01552     cp3= (char *)&mcol[2];
01553     
01554     if (quad) {
01555         cp4= (char *)&mcol[3];
01556 
01557         cp[0]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[0] + w[1]*cp2[0] + w[2]*cp3[0] + w[3]*cp4[0]);
01558         cp[1]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[1] + w[1]*cp2[1] + w[2]*cp3[1] + w[3]*cp4[1]);
01559         cp[2]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[2] + w[1]*cp2[2] + w[2]*cp3[2] + w[3]*cp4[2]);
01560         cp[3]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[3] + w[1]*cp2[3] + w[2]*cp3[3] + w[3]*cp4[3]);
01561     }
01562     else {
01563         cp[0]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[0] + w[1]*cp2[0] + w[2]*cp3[0]);
01564         cp[1]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[1] + w[1]*cp2[1] + w[2]*cp3[1]);
01565         cp[2]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[2] + w[1]*cp2[2] + w[2]*cp3[2]);
01566         cp[3]= (int)(w[0]*cp1[3] + w[1]*cp2[3] + w[2]*cp3[3]);
01567     }
01568 }
01569 
01570 static float psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(DerivedMesh *dm, short from, int index, const float fw[4], const float *values)
01571 {
01572     if (values==0 || index==-1)
01573         return 0.0;
01574 
01575     switch(from) {
01576         case PART_FROM_VERT:
01577             return values[index];
01578         case PART_FROM_FACE:
01579         case PART_FROM_VOLUME:
01580         {
01581             MFace *mf=dm->getTessFaceData(dm,index,CD_MFACE);
01582             return interpolate_particle_value(values[mf->v1],values[mf->v2],values[mf->v3],values[mf->v4],fw,mf->v4);
01583         }
01584             
01585     }
01586     return 0.0f;
01587 }
01588 
01589 /* conversion of pa->fw to origspace layer coordinates */
01590 static void psys_w_to_origspace(const float w[4], float uv[2])
01591 {
01592     uv[0]= w[1] + w[2];
01593     uv[1]= w[2] + w[3];
01594 }
01595 
01596 /* conversion of pa->fw to weights in face from origspace */
01597 static void psys_origspace_to_w(OrigSpaceFace *osface, int quad, const float w[4], float neww[4])
01598 {
01599     float v[4][3], co[3];
01600 
01601     v[0][0]= osface->uv[0][0]; v[0][1]= osface->uv[0][1]; v[0][2]= 0.0f;
01602     v[1][0]= osface->uv[1][0]; v[1][1]= osface->uv[1][1]; v[1][2]= 0.0f;
01603     v[2][0]= osface->uv[2][0]; v[2][1]= osface->uv[2][1]; v[2][2]= 0.0f;
01604 
01605     psys_w_to_origspace(w, co);
01606     co[2]= 0.0f;
01607     
01608     if (quad) {
01609         v[3][0]= osface->uv[3][0]; v[3][1]= osface->uv[3][1]; v[3][2]= 0.0f;
01610         interp_weights_poly_v3(neww, v, 4, co);
01611     }
01612     else {
01613         interp_weights_poly_v3(neww, v, 3, co);
01614         neww[3]= 0.0f;
01615     }
01616 }
01617 
01618 /* find the derived mesh face for a particle, set the mf passed. this is slow
01619  * and can be optimized but only for many lookups. returns the face index. */
01620 int psys_particle_dm_face_lookup(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, int index, const float fw[4], struct LinkNode *node)
01621 {
01622     Mesh *me= (Mesh*)ob->data;
01623     MPoly *mpoly;
01624     OrigSpaceFace *osface;
01625     int *origindex;
01626     int quad, findex, totface;
01627     float uv[2], (*faceuv)[2];
01628 
01629     mpoly = dm->getPolyArray(dm);
01630     origindex = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX);
01631     osface = dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGSPACE);
01632 
01633     totface = dm->getNumTessFaces(dm);
01634     
01635     if (osface==NULL || origindex==NULL) {
01636         /* Assume we don't need osface data */
01637         if (index <totface) {
01638             //printf("\tNO CD_ORIGSPACE, assuming not needed\n");
01639             return index;
01640         }
01641         else {
01642             printf("\tNO CD_ORIGSPACE, error out of range\n");
01643             return DMCACHE_NOTFOUND;
01644         }
01645     }
01646     else if (index >= me->totpoly)
01647         return DMCACHE_NOTFOUND; /* index not in the original mesh */
01648 
01649     psys_w_to_origspace(fw, uv);
01650     
01651     if (node) { /* we have a linked list of faces that we use, faster! */
01652         for (;node; node=node->next) {
01653             findex= GET_INT_FROM_POINTER(node->link);
01654             faceuv= osface[findex].uv;
01655             quad = (mpoly[findex].totloop == 4);
01656 
01657             /* check that this intersects - Its possible this misses :/ -
01658              * could also check its not between */
01659             if (quad) {
01660                 if (isect_point_quad_v2(uv, faceuv[0], faceuv[1], faceuv[2], faceuv[3]))
01661                     return findex;
01662             }
01663             else if (isect_point_tri_v2(uv, faceuv[0], faceuv[1], faceuv[2]))
01664                 return findex;
01665         }
01666     }
01667     else { /* if we have no node, try every face */
01668         for (findex=0; findex<totface; findex++) {
01669             if (origindex[findex] == index) {
01670                 faceuv= osface[findex].uv;
01671                 quad = (mpoly[findex].totloop == 4);
01672 
01673                 /* check that this intersects - Its possible this misses :/ -
01674                  * could also check its not between */
01675                 if (quad) {
01676                     if (isect_point_quad_v2(uv, faceuv[0], faceuv[1], faceuv[2], faceuv[3]))
01677                         return findex;
01678                 }
01679                 else if (isect_point_tri_v2(uv, faceuv[0], faceuv[1], faceuv[2]))
01680                     return findex;
01681             }
01682         }
01683     }
01684 
01685     return DMCACHE_NOTFOUND;
01686 }
01687 
01688 static int psys_map_index_on_dm(DerivedMesh *dm, int from, int index, int index_dmcache, const float fw[4], float UNUSED(foffset), int *mapindex, float mapfw[4])
01689 {
01690     if (index < 0)
01691         return 0;
01692 
01693     if (dm->deformedOnly || index_dmcache == DMCACHE_ISCHILD) {
01694         /* for meshes that are either only defined or for child particles, the
01695          * index and fw do not require any mapping, so we can directly use it */
01696         if (from == PART_FROM_VERT) {
01697             if (index >= dm->getNumVerts(dm))
01698                 return 0;
01699 
01700             *mapindex = index;
01701         }
01702         else { /* FROM_FACE/FROM_VOLUME */
01703             if (index >= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm))
01704                 return 0;
01705 
01706             *mapindex = index;
01707             copy_v4_v4(mapfw, fw);
01708         }
01709     }
01710     else {
01711         /* for other meshes that have been modified, we try to map the particle
01712          * to their new location, which means a different index, and for faces
01713          * also a new face interpolation weights */
01714         if (from == PART_FROM_VERT) {
01715             if (index_dmcache == DMCACHE_NOTFOUND || index_dmcache > dm->getNumVerts(dm))
01716                 return 0;
01717 
01718             *mapindex = index_dmcache;
01719         }
01720         else { /* FROM_FACE/FROM_VOLUME */
01721             /* find a face on the derived mesh that uses this face */
01722             MFace *mface;
01723             OrigSpaceFace *osface;
01724             int i;
01725 
01726             i = index_dmcache;
01727 
01728             if (i== DMCACHE_NOTFOUND || i >= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm))
01729                 return 0;
01730 
01731             *mapindex = i;
01732 
01733             /* modify the original weights to become
01734              * weights for the derived mesh face */
01735             osface= dm->getTessFaceDataArray(dm, CD_ORIGSPACE);
01736             mface= dm->getTessFaceData(dm, i, CD_MFACE);
01737 
01738             if (osface == NULL)
01739                 mapfw[0]= mapfw[1]= mapfw[2]= mapfw[3]= 0.0f;
01740             else
01741                 psys_origspace_to_w(&osface[i], mface->v4, fw, mapfw);
01742         }
01743     }
01744 
01745     return 1;
01746 }
01747 
01748 /* interprets particle data to get a point on a mesh in object space */
01749 void psys_particle_on_dm(DerivedMesh *dm, int from, int index, int index_dmcache, const float fw[4], float foffset, float vec[3], float nor[3], float utan[3], float vtan[3], float orco[3], float ornor[3])
01750 {
01751     float tmpnor[3], mapfw[4];
01752     float (*orcodata)[3];
01753     int mapindex;
01754 
01755     if (!psys_map_index_on_dm(dm, from, index, index_dmcache, fw, foffset, &mapindex, mapfw)) {
01756         if (vec) { vec[0]=vec[1]=vec[2]=0.0; }
01757         if (nor) { nor[0]=nor[1]=0.0; nor[2]=1.0; }
01758         if (orco) { orco[0]=orco[1]=orco[2]=0.0; }
01759         if (ornor) { ornor[0]=ornor[1]=0.0; ornor[2]=1.0; }
01760         if (utan) { utan[0]=utan[1]=utan[2]=0.0; }
01761         if (vtan) { vtan[0]=vtan[1]=vtan[2]=0.0; }
01762 
01763         return;
01764     }
01765 
01766     orcodata= dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_ORCO);
01767 
01768     if (from == PART_FROM_VERT) {
01769         dm->getVertCo(dm,mapindex,vec);
01770 
01771         if (nor) {
01772             dm->getVertNo(dm,mapindex,nor);
01773             normalize_v3(nor);
01774         }
01775 
01776         if (orco)
01777             copy_v3_v3(orco, orcodata[mapindex]);
01778 
01779         if (ornor) {
01780             dm->getVertNo(dm,mapindex,nor);
01781             normalize_v3(nor);
01782         }
01783 
01784         if (utan && vtan) {
01785             utan[0]= utan[1]= utan[2]= 0.0f;
01786             vtan[0]= vtan[1]= vtan[2]= 0.0f;
01787         }
01788     }
01789     else { /* PART_FROM_FACE / PART_FROM_VOLUME */
01790         MFace *mface;
01791         MTFace *mtface;
01792         MVert *mvert;
01793 
01794         mface=dm->getTessFaceData(dm,mapindex,CD_MFACE);
01795         mvert=dm->getVertDataArray(dm,CD_MVERT);
01796         mtface=CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData,CD_MTFACE);
01797 
01798         if (mtface)
01799             mtface += mapindex;
01800 
01801         if (from==PART_FROM_VOLUME) {
01802             psys_interpolate_face(mvert,mface,mtface,orcodata,mapfw,vec,tmpnor,utan,vtan,orco,ornor);
01803             if (nor)
01804                 copy_v3_v3(nor,tmpnor);
01805 
01806             normalize_v3(tmpnor);
01807             mul_v3_fl(tmpnor,-foffset);
01808             add_v3_v3(vec, tmpnor);
01809         }
01810         else
01811             psys_interpolate_face(mvert,mface,mtface,orcodata,mapfw,vec,nor,utan,vtan,orco,ornor);
01812     }
01813 }
01814 
01815 float psys_particle_value_from_verts(DerivedMesh *dm, short from, ParticleData *pa, float *values)
01816 {
01817     float mapfw[4];
01818     int mapindex;
01819 
01820     if (!psys_map_index_on_dm(dm, from, pa->num, pa->num_dmcache, pa->fuv, pa->foffset, &mapindex, mapfw))
01821         return 0.0f;
01822     
01823     return psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(dm, from, mapindex, mapfw, values);
01824 }
01825 
01826 ParticleSystemModifierData *psys_get_modifier(Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
01827 {
01828     ModifierData *md;
01829     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
01830 
01831     for (md=ob->modifiers.first; md; md=md->next) {
01832         if (md->type==eModifierType_ParticleSystem) {
01833             psmd= (ParticleSystemModifierData*) md;
01834             if (psmd->psys==psys) {
01835                 return psmd;
01836             }
01837         }
01838     }
01839     return NULL;
01840 }
01841 /************************************************/
01842 /*          Particles on a shape                */
01843 /************************************************/
01844 /* ready for future use */
01845 static void psys_particle_on_shape(int UNUSED(distr), int UNUSED(index), float *UNUSED(fuv), float *vec, float *nor, float *utan, float *vtan, float *orco, float *ornor)
01846 {
01847     /* TODO */
01848     float zerovec[3]={0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
01849     if (vec) {
01850         copy_v3_v3(vec,zerovec);
01851     }
01852     if (nor) {
01853         copy_v3_v3(nor,zerovec);
01854     }
01855     if (utan) {
01856         copy_v3_v3(utan,zerovec);
01857     }
01858     if (vtan) {
01859         copy_v3_v3(vtan,zerovec);
01860     }
01861     if (orco) {
01862         copy_v3_v3(orco,zerovec);
01863     }
01864     if (ornor) {
01865         copy_v3_v3(ornor,zerovec);
01866     }
01867 }
01868 /************************************************/
01869 /*          Particles on emitter                */
01870 /************************************************/
01871 void psys_particle_on_emitter(ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd, int from, int index, int index_dmcache, float *fuv, float foffset, float *vec, float *nor, float *utan, float *vtan, float *orco, float *ornor)
01872 {
01873     if (psmd) {
01874         if (psmd->psys->part->distr==PART_DISTR_GRID && psmd->psys->part->from != PART_FROM_VERT) {
01875             if (vec)
01876                 copy_v3_v3(vec,fuv);
01877 
01878             if (orco)
01879                 copy_v3_v3(orco, fuv);
01880             return;
01881         }
01882         /* we cant use the num_dmcache */
01883         psys_particle_on_dm(psmd->dm,from,index,index_dmcache,fuv,foffset,vec,nor,utan,vtan,orco,ornor);
01884     }
01885     else
01886         psys_particle_on_shape(from,index,fuv,vec,nor,utan,vtan,orco,ornor);
01887 
01888 }
01889 /************************************************/
01890 /*          Path Cache                          */
01891 /************************************************/
01892 
01893 static void do_kink(ParticleKey *state, ParticleKey *par, float *par_rot, float time, float freq, float shape, float amplitude, float flat, short type, short axis, float obmat[][4], int smooth_start)
01894 {
01895     float kink[3]={1.f,0.f,0.f}, par_vec[3], q1[4]={1.f,0.f,0.f,0.f};
01896     float t, dt=1.f, result[3];
01897 
01898     if (par == NULL || type == PART_KINK_NO)
01899         return;
01900 
01901     CLAMP(time, 0.f, 1.f);
01902 
01903     if (shape!=0.0f && type!=PART_KINK_BRAID) {
01904         if (shape<0.0f)
01905             time= (float)pow(time, 1.f+shape);
01906         else
01907             time= (float)pow(time, 1.f/(1.f-shape));
01908     }
01909 
01910     t = time * freq *(float)M_PI;
01911     
01912     if (smooth_start) {
01913         dt = fabs(t);
01914         /* smooth the beginning of kink */
01915         CLAMP(dt, 0.f, (float)M_PI);
01916         dt = sin(dt/2.f);
01917     }
01918 
01919     if (type != PART_KINK_RADIAL) {
01920         float temp[3];
01921 
01922         kink[axis]=1.f;
01923 
01924         if (obmat)
01925             mul_mat3_m4_v3(obmat, kink);
01926         
01927         if (par_rot)
01928             mul_qt_v3(par_rot, kink);
01929 
01930         /* make sure kink is normal to strand */
01931         project_v3_v3v3(temp, kink, par->vel);
01932         sub_v3_v3(kink, temp);
01933         normalize_v3(kink);
01934     }
01935 
01936     copy_v3_v3(result, state->co);
01937     sub_v3_v3v3(par_vec, par->co, state->co);
01938 
01939     switch(type) {
01940     case PART_KINK_CURL:
01941     {
01942         negate_v3(par_vec);
01943 
01944         if (flat > 0.f) {
01945             float proj[3];
01946             project_v3_v3v3(proj, par_vec, par->vel);
01947             madd_v3_v3fl(par_vec, proj, -flat);
01948 
01949             project_v3_v3v3(proj, par_vec, kink);
01950             madd_v3_v3fl(par_vec, proj, -flat);
01951         }
01952 
01953         axis_angle_to_quat(q1, kink, (float)M_PI/2.f);
01954 
01955         mul_qt_v3(q1, par_vec);
01956 
01957         madd_v3_v3fl(par_vec, kink, amplitude);
01958 
01959         /* rotate kink vector around strand tangent */
01960         if (t!=0.f) {
01961             axis_angle_to_quat(q1, par->vel, t);
01962             mul_qt_v3(q1, par_vec);
01963         }
01964 
01965         add_v3_v3v3(result, par->co, par_vec);
01966         break;
01967     }
01968     case PART_KINK_RADIAL:
01969     {
01970         if (flat > 0.f) {
01971             float proj[3];
01972             /* flatten along strand */
01973             project_v3_v3v3(proj, par_vec, par->vel);
01974             madd_v3_v3fl(result, proj, flat);
01975         }
01976 
01977         madd_v3_v3fl(result, par_vec, -amplitude*(float)sin(t));
01978         break;
01979     }
01980     case PART_KINK_WAVE:
01981     {
01982         madd_v3_v3fl(result, kink, amplitude*(float)sin(t));
01983 
01984         if (flat > 0.f) {
01985             float proj[3];
01986             /* flatten along wave */
01987             project_v3_v3v3(proj, par_vec, kink);
01988             madd_v3_v3fl(result, proj, flat);
01989 
01990             /* flatten along strand */
01991             project_v3_v3v3(proj, par_vec, par->vel);
01992             madd_v3_v3fl(result, proj, flat);
01993         }
01994         break;
01995     }
01996     case PART_KINK_BRAID:
01997     {
01998         float y_vec[3]={0.f,1.f,0.f};
01999         float z_vec[3]={0.f,0.f,1.f};
02000         float vec_one[3], state_co[3];
02001         float inp_y, inp_z, length;
02002 
02003         if (par_rot) {
02004             mul_qt_v3(par_rot, y_vec);
02005             mul_qt_v3(par_rot, z_vec);
02006         }
02007         
02008         negate_v3(par_vec);
02009         normalize_v3_v3(vec_one, par_vec);
02010 
02011         inp_y=dot_v3v3(y_vec, vec_one);
02012         inp_z=dot_v3v3(z_vec, vec_one);
02013 
02014         if (inp_y > 0.5f) {
02015             copy_v3_v3(state_co, y_vec);
02016 
02017             mul_v3_fl(y_vec, amplitude*(float)cos(t));
02018             mul_v3_fl(z_vec, amplitude/2.f*(float)sin(2.f*t));
02019         }
02020         else if (inp_z > 0.0f) {
02021             mul_v3_v3fl(state_co, z_vec, (float)sin((float)M_PI/3.f));
02022             madd_v3_v3fl(state_co, y_vec, -0.5f);
02023 
02024             mul_v3_fl(y_vec, -amplitude * (float)cos(t + (float)M_PI/3.f));
02025             mul_v3_fl(z_vec, amplitude/2.f * (float)cos(2.f*t + (float)M_PI/6.f));
02026         }
02027         else {
02028             mul_v3_v3fl(state_co, z_vec, -(float)sin((float)M_PI/3.f));
02029             madd_v3_v3fl(state_co, y_vec, -0.5f);
02030 
02031             mul_v3_fl(y_vec, amplitude * (float)-sin(t + (float)M_PI/6.f));
02032             mul_v3_fl(z_vec, amplitude/2.f * (float)-sin(2.f*t + (float)M_PI/3.f));
02033         }
02034 
02035         mul_v3_fl(state_co, amplitude);
02036         add_v3_v3(state_co, par->co);
02037         sub_v3_v3v3(par_vec, state->co, state_co);
02038 
02039         length = normalize_v3(par_vec);
02040         mul_v3_fl(par_vec, MIN2(length, amplitude/2.f));
02041 
02042         add_v3_v3v3(state_co, par->co, y_vec);
02043         add_v3_v3(state_co, z_vec);
02044         add_v3_v3(state_co, par_vec);
02045 
02046         shape = 2.f*(float)M_PI * (1.f+shape);
02047 
02048         if (t<shape) {
02049             shape = t/shape;
02050             shape = (float)sqrt((double)shape);
02051             interp_v3_v3v3(result, result, state_co, shape);
02052         }
02053         else {
02054             copy_v3_v3(result, state_co);
02055         }
02056         break;
02057     }
02058     }
02059 
02060     /* blend the start of the kink */
02061     if (dt < 1.f)
02062         interp_v3_v3v3(state->co, state->co, result, dt);
02063     else
02064         copy_v3_v3(state->co, result);
02065 }
02066 
02067 static float do_clump(ParticleKey *state, ParticleKey *par, float time, float clumpfac, float clumppow, float pa_clump)
02068 {
02069     float clump = 0.f;
02070 
02071     if (par && clumpfac!=0.0f) {
02072         float cpow;
02073 
02074         if (clumppow < 0.0f)
02075             cpow=1.0f+clumppow;
02076         else
02077             cpow=1.0f+9.0f*clumppow;
02078 
02079         if (clumpfac < 0.0f) /* clump roots instead of tips */
02080             clump = -clumpfac*pa_clump*(float)pow(1.0-(double)time,(double)cpow);
02081         else
02082             clump = clumpfac*pa_clump*(float)pow((double)time,(double)cpow);
02083 
02084         interp_v3_v3v3(state->co,state->co,par->co,clump);
02085     }
02086 
02087     return clump;
02088 }
02089 void precalc_guides(ParticleSimulationData *sim, ListBase *effectors)
02090 {
02091     EffectedPoint point;
02092     ParticleKey state;
02093     EffectorData efd;
02094     EffectorCache *eff;
02095     ParticleSystem *psys = sim->psys;
02096     EffectorWeights *weights = sim->psys->part->effector_weights;
02097     GuideEffectorData *data;
02098     PARTICLE_P;
02099 
02100     if (!effectors)
02101         return;
02102 
02103     LOOP_PARTICLES {
02104         psys_particle_on_emitter(sim->psmd,sim->psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,state.co,0,0,0,0,0);
02105         
02106         mul_m4_v3(sim->ob->obmat, state.co);
02107         mul_mat3_m4_v3(sim->ob->obmat, state.vel);
02108         
02109         pd_point_from_particle(sim, pa, &state, &point);
02110 
02111         for (eff = effectors->first; eff; eff=eff->next) {
02112             if (eff->pd->forcefield != PFIELD_GUIDE)
02113                 continue;
02114 
02115             if (!eff->guide_data)
02116                 eff->guide_data = MEM_callocN(sizeof(GuideEffectorData)*psys->totpart, "GuideEffectorData");
02117 
02118             data = eff->guide_data + p;
02119 
02120             sub_v3_v3v3(efd.vec_to_point, state.co, eff->guide_loc);
02121             copy_v3_v3(efd.nor, eff->guide_dir);
02122             efd.distance = len_v3(efd.vec_to_point);
02123 
02124             copy_v3_v3(data->vec_to_point, efd.vec_to_point);
02125             data->strength = effector_falloff(eff, &efd, &point, weights);
02126         }
02127     }
02128 }
02129 int do_guides(ListBase *effectors, ParticleKey *state, int index, float time)
02130 {
02131     EffectorCache *eff;
02132     PartDeflect *pd;
02133     Curve *cu;
02134     ParticleKey key, par;
02135     GuideEffectorData *data;
02136 
02137     float effect[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, veffect[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
02138     float guidevec[4], guidedir[3], rot2[4], temp[3];
02139     float guidetime, radius, weight, angle, totstrength = 0.0f;
02140     float vec_to_point[3];
02141 
02142     if (effectors) for (eff = effectors->first; eff; eff=eff->next) {
02143         pd = eff->pd;
02144 
02145         if (pd->forcefield != PFIELD_GUIDE)
02146             continue;
02147 
02148         data = eff->guide_data + index;
02149 
02150         if (data->strength <= 0.0f)
02151             continue;
02152 
02153         guidetime = time / (1.0f - pd->free_end);
02154 
02155         if (guidetime>1.0f)
02156             continue;
02157 
02158         cu = (Curve*)eff->ob->data;
02159 
02160         if (pd->flag & PFIELD_GUIDE_PATH_ADD) {
02161             if (where_on_path(eff->ob, data->strength * guidetime, guidevec, guidedir, NULL, &radius, &weight)==0)
02162                 return 0;
02163         }
02164         else {
02165             if (where_on_path(eff->ob, guidetime, guidevec, guidedir, NULL, &radius, &weight)==0)
02166                 return 0;
02167         }
02168 
02169         mul_m4_v3(eff->ob->obmat, guidevec);
02170         mul_mat3_m4_v3(eff->ob->obmat, guidedir);
02171 
02172         normalize_v3(guidedir);
02173 
02174         copy_v3_v3(vec_to_point, data->vec_to_point);
02175 
02176         if (guidetime != 0.0f) {
02177             /* curve direction */
02178             cross_v3_v3v3(temp, eff->guide_dir, guidedir);
02179             angle = dot_v3v3(eff->guide_dir, guidedir)/(len_v3(eff->guide_dir));
02180             angle = saacos(angle);
02181             axis_angle_to_quat( rot2,temp, angle);
02182             mul_qt_v3(rot2, vec_to_point);
02183 
02184             /* curve tilt */
02185             axis_angle_to_quat( rot2,guidedir, guidevec[3] - eff->guide_loc[3]);
02186             mul_qt_v3(rot2, vec_to_point);
02187         }
02188 
02189         /* curve taper */
02190         if (cu->taperobj)
02191             mul_v3_fl(vec_to_point, calc_taper(eff->scene, cu->taperobj, (int)(data->strength*guidetime*100.0f), 100));
02192 
02193         else { /* curve size*/
02194             if (cu->flag & CU_PATH_RADIUS) {
02195                 mul_v3_fl(vec_to_point, radius);
02196             }
02197         }
02198         par.co[0] = par.co[1] = par.co[2] = 0.0f;
02199         copy_v3_v3(key.co, vec_to_point);
02200         do_kink(&key, &par, 0, guidetime, pd->kink_freq, pd->kink_shape, pd->kink_amp, 0.f, pd->kink, pd->kink_axis, 0, 0);
02201         do_clump(&key, &par, guidetime, pd->clump_fac, pd->clump_pow, 1.0f);
02202         copy_v3_v3(vec_to_point, key.co);
02203 
02204         add_v3_v3(vec_to_point, guidevec);
02205 
02206         //sub_v3_v3v3(pa_loc,pa_loc,pa_zero);
02207         madd_v3_v3fl(effect, vec_to_point, data->strength);
02208         madd_v3_v3fl(veffect, guidedir, data->strength);
02209         totstrength += data->strength;
02210 
02211         if (pd->flag & PFIELD_GUIDE_PATH_WEIGHT)
02212             totstrength *= weight;
02213     }
02214 
02215     if (totstrength != 0.0f) {
02216         if (totstrength > 1.0f)
02217             mul_v3_fl(effect, 1.0f / totstrength);
02218         CLAMP(totstrength, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02219         //add_v3_v3(effect,pa_zero);
02220         interp_v3_v3v3(state->co, state->co, effect, totstrength);
02221 
02222         normalize_v3(veffect);
02223         mul_v3_fl(veffect, len_v3(state->vel));
02224         copy_v3_v3(state->vel, veffect);
02225         return 1;
02226     }
02227     return 0;
02228 }
02229 static void do_rough(float *loc, float mat[4][4], float t, float fac, float size, float thres, ParticleKey *state)
02230 {
02231     float rough[3];
02232     float rco[3];
02233 
02234     if (thres != 0.0f)
02235         if ((float)fabs((float)(-1.5f+loc[0]+loc[1]+loc[2]))<1.5f*thres) return;
02236 
02237     copy_v3_v3(rco,loc);
02238     mul_v3_fl(rco,t);
02239     rough[0]=-1.0f+2.0f*BLI_gTurbulence(size, rco[0], rco[1], rco[2], 2,0,2);
02240     rough[1]=-1.0f+2.0f*BLI_gTurbulence(size, rco[1], rco[2], rco[0], 2,0,2);
02241     rough[2]=-1.0f+2.0f*BLI_gTurbulence(size, rco[2], rco[0], rco[1], 2,0,2);
02242 
02243     madd_v3_v3fl(state->co, mat[0], fac * rough[0]);
02244     madd_v3_v3fl(state->co, mat[1], fac * rough[1]);
02245     madd_v3_v3fl(state->co, mat[2], fac * rough[2]);
02246 }
02247 static void do_rough_end(float *loc, float mat[4][4], float t, float fac, float shape, ParticleKey *state)
02248 {
02249     float rough[2];
02250     float roughfac;
02251 
02252     roughfac=fac*(float)pow((double)t,shape);
02253     copy_v2_v2(rough,loc);
02254     rough[0]=-1.0f+2.0f*rough[0];
02255     rough[1]=-1.0f+2.0f*rough[1];
02256     mul_v2_fl(rough,roughfac);
02257 
02258     madd_v3_v3fl(state->co, mat[0], rough[0]);
02259     madd_v3_v3fl(state->co, mat[1], rough[1]);
02260 }
02261 static void do_path_effectors(ParticleSimulationData *sim, int i, ParticleCacheKey *ca, int k, int steps, float *UNUSED(rootco), float effector, float UNUSED(dfra), float UNUSED(cfra), float *length, float *vec)
02262 {
02263     float force[3] = {0.0f,0.0f,0.0f};
02264     ParticleKey eff_key;
02265     EffectedPoint epoint;
02266 
02267     /* Don't apply effectors for dynamic hair, otherwise the effectors don't get applied twice. */
02268     if (sim->psys->flag & PSYS_HAIR_DYNAMICS)
02269         return;
02270 
02271     copy_v3_v3(eff_key.co,(ca-1)->co);
02272     copy_v3_v3(eff_key.vel,(ca-1)->vel);
02273     copy_qt_qt(eff_key.rot,(ca-1)->rot);
02274 
02275     pd_point_from_particle(sim, sim->psys->particles+i, &eff_key, &epoint);
02276     pdDoEffectors(sim->psys->effectors, sim->colliders, sim->psys->part->effector_weights, &epoint, force, NULL);
02277 
02278     mul_v3_fl(force, effector*powf((float)k / (float)steps, 100.0f * sim->psys->part->eff_hair) / (float)steps);
02279 
02280     add_v3_v3(force, vec);
02281 
02282     normalize_v3(force);
02283 
02284     if (k < steps)
02285         sub_v3_v3v3(vec, (ca+1)->co, ca->co);
02286 
02287     madd_v3_v3v3fl(ca->co, (ca-1)->co, force, *length);
02288 
02289     if (k < steps)
02290         *length = len_v3(vec);
02291 }
02292 static int check_path_length(int k, ParticleCacheKey *keys, ParticleCacheKey *state, float max_length, float *cur_length, float length, float *dvec)
02293 {
02294     if (*cur_length + length > max_length) {
02295         mul_v3_fl(dvec, (max_length - *cur_length) / length);
02296         add_v3_v3v3(state->co, (state - 1)->co, dvec);
02297         keys->steps = k;
02298         /* something over the maximum step value */
02299         return k=100000;
02300     }
02301     else {
02302         *cur_length+=length;
02303         return k;
02304     }
02305 }
02306 static void offset_child(ChildParticle *cpa, ParticleKey *par, float *par_rot, ParticleKey *child, float flat, float radius)
02307 {
02308     copy_v3_v3(child->co, cpa->fuv);
02309     mul_v3_fl(child->co, radius);
02310 
02311     child->co[0]*=flat;
02312 
02313     copy_v3_v3(child->vel, par->vel);
02314 
02315     if (par_rot) {
02316         mul_qt_v3(par_rot, child->co);
02317         copy_qt_qt(child->rot, par_rot);
02318     }
02319     else
02320         unit_qt(child->rot);
02321 
02322     add_v3_v3(child->co, par->co);
02323 }
