02324 float *psys_cache_vgroup(DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleSystem *psys, int vgroup)
02325 {
02326     float *vg=0;
02327 
02328     if (vgroup < 0) {
02329         /* hair dynamics pinning vgroup */
02330 
02331     }
02332     else if (psys->vgroup[vgroup]) {
02333         MDeformVert *dvert = dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_MDEFORMVERT);
02334         if (dvert) {
02335             int totvert=dm->getNumVerts(dm), i;
02336             vg=MEM_callocN(sizeof(float)*totvert, "vg_cache");
02337             if (psys->vg_neg&(1<<vgroup)) {
02338                 for (i=0; i<totvert; i++)
02339                     vg[i]= 1.0f - defvert_find_weight(&dvert[i], psys->vgroup[vgroup] - 1);
02340             }
02341             else {
02342                 for (i=0; i<totvert; i++)
02343                     vg[i]=  defvert_find_weight(&dvert[i], psys->vgroup[vgroup] - 1);
02344             }
02345         }
02346     }
02347     return vg;
02348 }
02349 void psys_find_parents(ParticleSimulationData *sim)
02350 {
02351     ParticleSettings *part=sim->psys->part;
02352     KDTree *tree;
02353     ChildParticle *cpa;
02354     int p, totparent,totchild=sim->psys->totchild;
02355     float co[3], orco[3];
02356     int from=PART_FROM_FACE;
02357     totparent=(int)(totchild*part->parents*0.3f);
02358 
02359     if (G.rendering && part->child_nbr && part->ren_child_nbr)
02360         totparent*=(float)part->child_nbr/(float)part->ren_child_nbr;
02361 
02362     tree=BLI_kdtree_new(totparent);
02363 
02364     for (p=0,cpa=sim->psys->child; p<totparent; p++,cpa++) {
02365         psys_particle_on_emitter(sim->psmd,from,cpa->num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,cpa->foffset,co,0,0,0,orco,0);
02366         BLI_kdtree_insert(tree, p, orco, NULL);
02367     }
02368 
02369     BLI_kdtree_balance(tree);
02370 
02371     for (; p<totchild; p++,cpa++) {
02372         psys_particle_on_emitter(sim->psmd,from,cpa->num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,cpa->foffset,co,0,0,0,orco,0);
02373         cpa->parent=BLI_kdtree_find_nearest(tree, orco, NULL, NULL);
02374     }
02375 
02376     BLI_kdtree_free(tree);
02377 }
02378 
02379 static void get_strand_normal(Material *ma, const float surfnor[3], float surfdist, float nor[3])
02380 {
02381     float cross[3], nstrand[3], vnor[3], blend;
02382 
02383     if (!((ma->mode & MA_STR_SURFDIFF) || (ma->strand_surfnor > 0.0f)))
02384         return;
02385 
02386     if (ma->mode & MA_STR_SURFDIFF) {
02387         cross_v3_v3v3(cross, surfnor, nor);
02388         cross_v3_v3v3(nstrand, nor, cross);
02389 
02390         blend = dot_v3v3(nstrand, surfnor);
02391         CLAMP(blend, 0.0f, 1.0f);
02392 
02393         interp_v3_v3v3(vnor, nstrand, surfnor, blend);
02394         normalize_v3(vnor);
02395     }
02396     else {
02397         copy_v3_v3(vnor, nor);
02398     }
02399     
02400     if (ma->strand_surfnor > 0.0f) {
02401         if (ma->strand_surfnor > surfdist) {
02402             blend= (ma->strand_surfnor - surfdist)/ma->strand_surfnor;
02403             interp_v3_v3v3(vnor, vnor, surfnor, blend);
02404             normalize_v3(vnor);
02405         }
02406     }
02407 
02408     copy_v3_v3(nor, vnor);
02409 }
02410 
02411 static int psys_threads_init_path(ParticleThread *threads, Scene *scene, float cfra, int editupdate)
02412 {
02413     ParticleThreadContext *ctx= threads[0].ctx;
02414 /*  Object *ob= ctx->sim.ob; */
02415     ParticleSystem *psys= ctx->sim.psys;
02416     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
02417 /*  ParticleEditSettings *pset = &scene->toolsettings->particle; */
02418     int totparent=0, between=0;
02419     int steps = (int)pow(2.0, (double)part->draw_step);
02420     int totchild = psys->totchild;
02421     int i, seed, totthread= threads[0].tot;
02422 
02423     /*---start figuring out what is actually wanted---*/
02424     if (psys_in_edit_mode(scene, psys)) {
02425         ParticleEditSettings *pset = &scene->toolsettings->particle;
02426 
02427         if (psys->renderdata==0 && (psys->edit==NULL || pset->flag & PE_DRAW_PART)==0)
02428             totchild=0;
02429 
02430         steps = (int)pow(2.0, (double)pset->draw_step);
02431     }
02432 
02433     if (totchild && part->childtype==PART_CHILD_FACES) {
02434         totparent=(int)(totchild*part->parents*0.3f);
02435         
02436         if (G.rendering && part->child_nbr && part->ren_child_nbr)
02437             totparent*=(float)part->child_nbr/(float)part->ren_child_nbr;
02438 
02439         /* part->parents could still be 0 so we can't test with totparent */
02440         between=1;
02441     }
02442 
02443     if (psys->renderdata)
02444         steps=(int)pow(2.0,(double)part->ren_step);
02445     else {
02446         totchild=(int)((float)totchild*(float)part->disp/100.0f);
02447         totparent=MIN2(totparent,totchild);
02448     }
02449 
02450     if (totchild==0) return 0;
02451 
02452     /* init random number generator */
02453     seed= 31415926 + ctx->sim.psys->seed;
02454     
02455     if (ctx->editupdate || totchild < 10000)
02456         totthread= 1;
02457     
02458     for (i=0; i<totthread; i++) {
02459         threads[i].rng_path= rng_new(seed);
02460         threads[i].tot= totthread;
02461     }
02462 
02463     /* fill context values */
02464     ctx->between= between;
02465     ctx->steps= steps;
02466     ctx->totchild= totchild;
02467     ctx->totparent= totparent;
02468     ctx->parent_pass= 0;
02469     ctx->cfra= cfra;
02470     ctx->editupdate= editupdate;
02471 
02472     psys->lattice = psys_get_lattice(&ctx->sim);
02473 
02474     /* cache all relevant vertex groups if they exist */
02475     ctx->vg_length = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_LENGTH);
02476     ctx->vg_clump = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_CLUMP);
02477     ctx->vg_kink = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_KINK);
02478     ctx->vg_rough1 = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_ROUGH1);
02479     ctx->vg_rough2 = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_ROUGH2);
02480     ctx->vg_roughe = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_ROUGHE);
02481     if (psys->part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT)
02482         ctx->vg_effector = psys_cache_vgroup(ctx->dm,psys,PSYS_VG_EFFECTOR);
02483 
02484     /* set correct ipo timing */
02485 #if 0 // XXX old animation system
02486     if (part->flag&PART_ABS_TIME && part->ipo) {
02487         calc_ipo(part->ipo, cfra);
02488         execute_ipo((ID *)part, part->ipo);
02489     }
02490 #endif // XXX old animation system
02491 
02492     return 1;
02493 }
02494 
02495 /* note: this function must be thread safe, except for branching! */
02496 static void psys_thread_create_path(ParticleThread *thread, struct ChildParticle *cpa, ParticleCacheKey *child_keys, int i)
02497 {
02498     ParticleThreadContext *ctx= thread->ctx;
02499     Object *ob= ctx->sim.ob;
02500     ParticleSystem *psys = ctx->sim.psys;
02501     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
02502     ParticleCacheKey **cache= psys->childcache;
02503     ParticleCacheKey **pcache= psys_in_edit_mode(ctx->sim.scene, psys) ? psys->edit->pathcache : psys->pathcache;
02504     ParticleCacheKey *child, *par = NULL, *key[4];
02505     ParticleTexture ptex;
02506     float *cpa_fuv=0, *par_rot=0, rot[4];
02507     float orco[3], ornor[3], hairmat[4][4], t, dvec[3], off1[4][3], off2[4][3];
02508     float length, max_length = 1.0f, cur_length = 0.0f;
02509     float eff_length, eff_vec[3], weight[4];
02510     int k, cpa_num;
02511     short cpa_from;
02512 
02513     if (!pcache)
02514         return;
02515 
02516     if (ctx->between) {
02517         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + cpa->pa[0];
02518         int w, needupdate;
02519         float foffset, wsum=0.f;
02520         float co[3];
02521         float p_min = part->parting_min;
02522         float p_max = part->parting_max;
02523         /* Virtual parents don't work nicely with parting. */
02524         float p_fac = part->parents > 0.f ? 0.f : part->parting_fac;
02525 
02526         if (ctx->editupdate) {
02527             needupdate= 0;
02528             w= 0;
02529             while (w<4 && cpa->pa[w]>=0) {
02530                 if (psys->edit->points[cpa->pa[w]].flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC) {
02531                     needupdate= 1;
02532                     break;
02533                 }
02534                 w++;
02535             }
02536 
02537             if (!needupdate)
02538                 return;
02539             else
02540                 memset(child_keys, 0, sizeof(*child_keys)*(ctx->steps+1));
02541         }
02542 
02543         /* get parent paths */
02544         for (w=0; w<4; w++) {
02545             if (cpa->pa[w] >= 0) {
02546                 key[w] = pcache[cpa->pa[w]];
02547                 weight[w] = cpa->w[w];
02548             }
02549             else {
02550                 key[w] = pcache[0];
02551                 weight[w] = 0.f;
02552             }
02553         }
02554 
02555         /* modify weights to create parting */
02556         if (p_fac > 0.f) {
02557             for (w=0; w<4; w++) {
02558                 if (w && weight[w] > 0.f) {
02559                     float d;
02560                     if (part->flag & PART_CHILD_LONG_HAIR) {
02561                         /* For long hair use tip distance/root distance as parting factor instead of root to tip angle. */
02562                         float d1 = len_v3v3(key[0]->co, key[w]->co);
02563                         float d2 = len_v3v3((key[0]+key[0]->steps-1)->co, (key[w]+key[w]->steps-1)->co);
02564 
02565                         d = d1 > 0.f ? d2/d1 - 1.f : 10000.f;
02566                     }
02567                     else {
02568                         float v1[3], v2[3];
02569                         sub_v3_v3v3(v1, (key[0]+key[0]->steps-1)->co, key[0]->co);
02570                         sub_v3_v3v3(v2, (key[w]+key[w]->steps-1)->co, key[w]->co);
02571                         normalize_v3(v1);
02572                         normalize_v3(v2);
02573 
02574                         d = RAD2DEGF(saacos(dot_v3v3(v1, v2)));
02575                     }
02576 
02577                     if (p_max > p_min)
02578                         d = (d - p_min)/(p_max - p_min);
02579                     else
02580                         d = (d - p_min) <= 0.f ? 0.f : 1.f;
02581 
02582                     CLAMP(d, 0.f, 1.f);
02583 
02584                     if (d > 0.f)
02585                         weight[w] *= (1.f - d);
02586                 }
02587                 wsum += weight[w];
02588             }
02589             for (w=0; w<4; w++)
02590                 weight[w] /= wsum;
02591 
02592             interp_v4_v4v4(weight, cpa->w, weight, p_fac);
02593         }
02594 
02595         /* get the original coordinates (orco) for texture usage */
02596         cpa_num = cpa->num;
02597         
02598         foffset = cpa->foffset;
02599         cpa_fuv = cpa->fuv;
02600         cpa_from = PART_FROM_FACE;
02601 
02602         psys_particle_on_emitter(ctx->sim.psmd,cpa_from,cpa_num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,foffset,co,ornor,0,0,orco,0);
02603 
02604         mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat, co);
02605 
02606         for (w=0; w<4; w++)
02607             sub_v3_v3v3(off1[w], co, key[w]->co);
02608 
02609         psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, ctx->sim.psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
02610     }
02611     else {
02612         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + cpa->parent;
02613         float co[3];
02614         if (ctx->editupdate) {
02615             if (!(psys->edit->points[cpa->parent].flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC))
02616                 return;
02617 
02618             memset(child_keys, 0, sizeof(*child_keys)*(ctx->steps+1));
02619         }
02620 
02621         /* get the parent path */
02622         key[0] = pcache[cpa->parent];
02623 
02624         /* get the original coordinates (orco) for texture usage */
02625         cpa_from = part->from;
02626         cpa_num = pa->num;
02627         cpa_fuv = pa->fuv;
02628 
02629         psys_particle_on_emitter(ctx->sim.psmd,cpa_from,cpa_num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa_fuv,pa->foffset,co,ornor,0,0,orco,0);
02630 
02631         psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, ctx->sim.psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
02632     }
02633 
02634     child_keys->steps = ctx->steps;
02635 
02636     /* get different child parameters from textures & vgroups */
02637     get_child_modifier_parameters(part, ctx, cpa, cpa_from, cpa_num, cpa_fuv, orco, &ptex);
02638 
02639     if (ptex.exist < PSYS_FRAND(i + 24)) {
02640         child_keys->steps = -1;
02641         return;
02642     }
02643 
02644     /* create the child path */
02645     for (k=0,child=child_keys; k<=ctx->steps; k++,child++) {
02646         if (ctx->between) {
02647             int w=0;
02648 
02649             zero_v3(child->co);
02650             zero_v3(child->vel);
02651             unit_qt(child->rot);
02652 
02653             for (w=0; w<4; w++) {
02654                 copy_v3_v3(off2[w], off1[w]);
02655 
02656                 if (part->flag & PART_CHILD_LONG_HAIR) {
02657                     /* Use parent rotation (in addition to emission location) to determine child offset. */
02658                     if (k)
02659                         mul_qt_v3((key[w]+k)->rot, off2[w]);
02660 
02661                     /* Fade the effect of rotation for even lengths in the end */
02662                     project_v3_v3v3(dvec, off2[w], (key[w]+k)->vel);
02663                     madd_v3_v3fl(off2[w], dvec, -(float)k/(float)ctx->steps);
02664                 }
02665 
02666                 add_v3_v3(off2[w], (key[w]+k)->co);
02667             }
02668 
02669             /* child position is the weighted sum of parent positions */
02670             interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(child->co, off2[0], off2[1], off2[2], off2[3], weight);
02671             interp_v3_v3v3v3v3(child->vel, (key[0]+k)->vel, (key[1]+k)->vel, (key[2]+k)->vel, (key[3]+k)->vel, weight);
02672 
02673             copy_qt_qt(child->rot, (key[0]+k)->rot);
02674         }
02675         else {
02676             if (k) {
02677                 mul_qt_qtqt(rot, (key[0]+k)->rot, key[0]->rot);
02678                 par_rot = rot;
02679             }
02680             else {
02681                 par_rot = key[0]->rot;
02682             }
02683             /* offset the child from the parent position */
02684             offset_child(cpa, (ParticleKey*)(key[0]+k), par_rot, (ParticleKey*)child, part->childflat, part->childrad);
02685         }
02686 
02687         child->time = (float)k/(float)ctx->steps;
02688     }
02689 
02690     /* apply effectors */
02691     if (part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT) {
02692         for (k=0,child=child_keys; k<=ctx->steps; k++,child++) {
02693             if (k) {
02694                 do_path_effectors(&ctx->sim, cpa->pa[0], child, k, ctx->steps, child_keys->co, ptex.effector, 0.0f, ctx->cfra, &eff_length, eff_vec);
02695             }
02696             else {
02697                 sub_v3_v3v3(eff_vec, (child+1)->co, child->co);
02698                 eff_length = len_v3(eff_vec);
02699             }
02700         }
02701     }
02702 
02703     for (k=0,child=child_keys; k<=ctx->steps; k++,child++) {
02704         t = (float)k/(float)ctx->steps;
02705 
02706         if (ctx->totparent)
02707             /* this is now threadsafe, virtual parents are calculated before rest of children */
02708             par = (i >= ctx->totparent) ? cache[cpa->parent] : NULL;
02709         else if (cpa->parent >= 0)
02710             par = pcache[cpa->parent];
02711 
02712         if (par) {
02713             if (k) {
02714                 mul_qt_qtqt(rot, (par+k)->rot, par->rot);
02715                 par_rot = rot;
02716             }
02717             else {
02718                 par_rot = par->rot;
02719             }
02720             par += k;
02721         }
02722 
02723         /* apply different deformations to the child path */
02724         do_child_modifiers(&ctx->sim, &ptex, (ParticleKey *)par, par_rot, cpa, orco, hairmat, (ParticleKey *)child, t);
02725 
02726         /* we have to correct velocity because of kink & clump */
02727         if (k>1) {
02728             sub_v3_v3v3((child-1)->vel, child->co, (child-2)->co);
02729             mul_v3_fl((child-1)->vel, 0.5);
02730 
02731             if (ctx->ma && (part->draw_col == PART_DRAW_COL_MAT))
02732                 get_strand_normal(ctx->ma, ornor, cur_length, (child-1)->vel);
02733         }
02734 
02735         if (k == ctx->steps)
02736             sub_v3_v3v3(child->vel, child->co, (child-1)->co);
02737 
02738         /* check if path needs to be cut before actual end of data points */
02739         if (k) {
02740             sub_v3_v3v3(dvec, child->co, (child-1)->co);
02741             length = 1.0f/(float)ctx->steps;
02742             k = check_path_length(k, child_keys, child, max_length, &cur_length, length, dvec);
02743         }
02744         else {
02745             /* initialize length calculation */
02746             max_length = ptex.length;
02747             cur_length = 0.0f;
02748         }
02749 
02750         if (ctx->ma && (part->draw_col == PART_DRAW_COL_MAT)) {
02751             copy_v3_v3(child->col, &ctx->ma->r);
02752             get_strand_normal(ctx->ma, ornor, cur_length, child->vel);
02753         }
02754     }
02755 
02756     /* Hide virtual parents */
02757     if (i < ctx->totparent)
02758         child_keys->steps = -1;
02759 }
02760 
02761 static void *exec_child_path_cache(void *data)
02762 {
02763     ParticleThread *thread= (ParticleThread*)data;
02764     ParticleThreadContext *ctx= thread->ctx;
02765     ParticleSystem *psys= ctx->sim.psys;
02766     ParticleCacheKey **cache= psys->childcache;
02767     ChildParticle *cpa;
02768     int i, totchild= ctx->totchild, first= 0;
02769 
02770     if (thread->tot > 1) {
02771         first= ctx->parent_pass? 0 : ctx->totparent;
02772         totchild= ctx->parent_pass? ctx->totparent : ctx->totchild;
02773     }
02774     
02775     cpa= psys->child + first + thread->num;
02776     for (i=first+thread->num; i<totchild; i+=thread->tot, cpa+=thread->tot)
02777         psys_thread_create_path(thread, cpa, cache[i], i);
02778 
02779     return 0;
02780 }
02781 
02782 void psys_cache_child_paths(ParticleSimulationData *sim, float cfra, int editupdate)
02783 {
02784     ParticleThread *pthreads;
02785     ParticleThreadContext *ctx;
02786     ListBase threads;
02787     int i, totchild, totparent, totthread;
02788 
02789     if (sim->psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)
02790         return;
02791 
02792     pthreads= psys_threads_create(sim);
02793 
02794     if (!psys_threads_init_path(pthreads, sim->scene, cfra, editupdate)) {
02795         psys_threads_free(pthreads);
02796         return;
02797     }
02798 
02799     ctx= pthreads[0].ctx;
02800     totchild= ctx->totchild;
02801     totparent= ctx->totparent;
02802 
02803     if (editupdate && sim->psys->childcache && totchild == sim->psys->totchildcache) {
02804         ; /* just overwrite the existing cache */
02805     }
02806     else {
02807         /* clear out old and create new empty path cache */
02808         free_child_path_cache(sim->psys);
02809         sim->psys->childcache= psys_alloc_path_cache_buffers(&sim->psys->childcachebufs, totchild, ctx->steps+1);
02810         sim->psys->totchildcache = totchild;
02811     }
02812 
02813     totthread= pthreads[0].tot;
02814 
02815     if (totthread > 1) {
02816 
02817         /* make virtual child parents thread safe by calculating them first */
02818         if (totparent) {
02819             BLI_init_threads(&threads, exec_child_path_cache, totthread);
02820             
02821             for (i=0; i<totthread; i++) {
02822                 pthreads[i].ctx->parent_pass = 1;
02823                 BLI_insert_thread(&threads, &pthreads[i]);
02824             }
02825 
02826             BLI_end_threads(&threads);
02827 
02828             for (i=0; i<totthread; i++)
02829                 pthreads[i].ctx->parent_pass = 0;
02830         }
02831 
02832         BLI_init_threads(&threads, exec_child_path_cache, totthread);
02833 
02834         for (i=0; i<totthread; i++)
02835             BLI_insert_thread(&threads, &pthreads[i]);
02836 
02837         BLI_end_threads(&threads);
02838     }
02839     else
02840         exec_child_path_cache(&pthreads[0]);
02841 
02842     psys_threads_free(pthreads);
02843 }
02844 /* figure out incremental rotations along path starting from unit quat */
02845 static void cache_key_incremental_rotation(ParticleCacheKey *key0, ParticleCacheKey *key1, ParticleCacheKey *key2, float *prev_tangent, int i)
02846 {
02847     float cosangle, angle, tangent[3], normal[3], q[4];
02848 
02849     switch(i) {
02850     case 0:
02851         /* start from second key */
02852         break;
02853     case 1:
02854         /* calculate initial tangent for incremental rotations */
02855         sub_v3_v3v3(prev_tangent, key0->co, key1->co);
02856         normalize_v3(prev_tangent);
02857         unit_qt(key1->rot);
02858         break;
02859     default:
02860         sub_v3_v3v3(tangent, key0->co, key1->co);
02861         normalize_v3(tangent);
02862 
02863         cosangle= dot_v3v3(tangent, prev_tangent);
02864 
02865         /* note we do the comparison on cosangle instead of
02866          * angle, since floating point accuracy makes it give
02867          * different results across platforms */
02868         if (cosangle > 0.999999f) {
02869             copy_v4_v4(key1->rot, key2->rot);
02870         }
02871         else {
02872             angle= saacos(cosangle);
02873             cross_v3_v3v3(normal, prev_tangent, tangent);
02874             axis_angle_to_quat( q,normal, angle);
02875             mul_qt_qtqt(key1->rot, q, key2->rot);
02876         }
02877 
02878         copy_v3_v3(prev_tangent, tangent);
02879     }
02880 }
02881 
02887 void psys_cache_paths(ParticleSimulationData *sim, float cfra)
02888 {
02889     PARTICLE_PSMD;
02890     ParticleEditSettings *pset = &sim->scene->toolsettings->particle;
02891     ParticleSystem *psys = sim->psys;
02892     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
02893     ParticleCacheKey *ca, **cache;
02894 
02895     DerivedMesh *hair_dm = (psys->part->type==PART_HAIR && psys->flag & PSYS_HAIR_DYNAMICS) ? psys->hair_out_dm : NULL;
02896     
02897     ParticleKey result;
02898     
02899     Material *ma;
02900     ParticleInterpolationData pind;
02901     ParticleTexture ptex;
02902 
02903     PARTICLE_P;
02904     
02905     float birthtime = 0.0, dietime = 0.0;
02906     float t, time = 0.0, dfra = 1.0 /* , frs_sec = sim->scene->r.frs_sec*/ /*UNUSED*/;
02907     float col[4] = {0.5f, 0.5f, 0.5f, 1.0f};
02908     float prev_tangent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, hairmat[4][4];
02909     float rotmat[3][3];
02910     int k;
02911     int steps = (int)pow(2.0, (double)(psys->renderdata ? part->ren_step : part->draw_step));
02912     int totpart = psys->totpart;
02913     float length, vec[3];
02914     float *vg_effector= NULL;
02915     float *vg_length= NULL, pa_length=1.0f;
02916     int keyed, baked;
02917 
02918     /* we don't have anything valid to create paths from so let's quit here */
02919     if ((psys->flag & PSYS_HAIR_DONE || psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED || psys->pointcache)==0)
02920         return;
02921 
02922     if (psys_in_edit_mode(sim->scene, psys))
02923         if (psys->renderdata==0 && (psys->edit==NULL || pset->flag & PE_DRAW_PART)==0)
02924             return;
02925 
02926     keyed = psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED;
02927     baked = psys->pointcache->mem_cache.first && psys->part->type != PART_HAIR;
02928 
02929     /* clear out old and create new empty path cache */
02930     psys_free_path_cache(psys, psys->edit);
02931     cache= psys->pathcache= psys_alloc_path_cache_buffers(&psys->pathcachebufs, totpart, steps+1);
02932 
02933     psys->lattice = psys_get_lattice(sim);
02934     ma= give_current_material(sim->ob, psys->part->omat);
02935     if (ma && (psys->part->draw_col == PART_DRAW_COL_MAT))
02936         copy_v3_v3(col, &ma->r);
02937 
02938     if ((psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)==0) {
02939         if ((psys->part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT)==0)
02940             vg_effector = psys_cache_vgroup(psmd->dm, psys, PSYS_VG_EFFECTOR);
02941         
02942         if (!psys->totchild)
02943             vg_length = psys_cache_vgroup(psmd->dm, psys, PSYS_VG_LENGTH);
02944     }
02945 
02946     /* ensure we have tessfaces to be used for mapping */
02947     if (part->from != PART_FROM_VERT) {
02948         DM_ensure_tessface(psmd->dm);
02949     }
02950 
02951     /*---first main loop: create all actual particles' paths---*/
02952     LOOP_SHOWN_PARTICLES {
02953         if (!psys->totchild) {
02954             psys_get_texture(sim, pa, &ptex, PAMAP_LENGTH, 0.f);
02955             pa_length = ptex.length * (1.0f - part->randlength * PSYS_FRAND(psys->seed + p));
02956             if (vg_length)
02957                 pa_length *= psys_particle_value_from_verts(psmd->dm,part->from,pa,vg_length);
02958         }
02959 
02960         pind.keyed = keyed;
02961         pind.cache = baked ? psys->pointcache : NULL;
02962         pind.epoint = NULL;
02963         pind.bspline = (psys->part->flag & PART_HAIR_BSPLINE);
02964         pind.dm = hair_dm;
02965 
02966         memset(cache[p], 0, sizeof(*cache[p])*(steps+1));
02967 
02968         cache[p]->steps = steps;
02969 
02970         /*--get the first data points--*/
02971         init_particle_interpolation(sim->ob, sim->psys, pa, &pind);
02972 
02973         /* hairmat is needed for for non-hair particle too so we get proper rotations */
02974         psys_mat_hair_to_global(sim->ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
02975         copy_v3_v3(rotmat[0], hairmat[2]);
02976         copy_v3_v3(rotmat[1], hairmat[1]);
02977         copy_v3_v3(rotmat[2], hairmat[0]);
02978 
02979         if (part->draw & PART_ABS_PATH_TIME) {
02980             birthtime = MAX2(pind.birthtime, part->path_start);
02981             dietime = MIN2(pind.dietime, part->path_end);
02982         }
02983         else {
02984             float tb = pind.birthtime;
02985             birthtime = tb + part->path_start * (pind.dietime - tb);
02986             dietime = tb + part->path_end * (pind.dietime - tb);
02987         }
02988 
02989         if (birthtime >= dietime) {
02990             cache[p]->steps = -1;
02991             continue;
02992         }
02993 
02994         dietime = birthtime + pa_length * (dietime - birthtime);
02995 
02996         /*--interpolate actual path from data points--*/
02997         for (k=0, ca=cache[p]; k<=steps; k++, ca++) {
02998             time = (float)k / (float)steps;
02999             t = birthtime + time * (dietime - birthtime);
03000             result.time = -t;
03001             do_particle_interpolation(psys, p, pa, t, &pind, &result);
03002             copy_v3_v3(ca->co, result.co);
03003 
03004             /* dynamic hair is in object space */
03005             /* keyed and baked are already in global space */
03006             if (hair_dm)
03007                 mul_m4_v3(sim->ob->obmat, ca->co);
03008             else if (!keyed && !baked && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR))
03009                 mul_m4_v3(hairmat, ca->co);
03010 
03011             copy_v3_v3(ca->col, col);
03012         }
03013         
03014         /*--modify paths and calculate rotation & velocity--*/
03015 
03016         if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
03017             /* apply effectors */
03018             if ((psys->part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT) == 0) {
03019                 float effector= 1.0f;
03020                 if (vg_effector)
03021                     effector*= psys_particle_value_from_verts(psmd->dm,psys->part->from,pa,vg_effector);
03022 
03023                 sub_v3_v3v3(vec,(cache[p]+1)->co,cache[p]->co);
03024                 length = len_v3(vec);
03025 
03026                 for (k=1, ca=cache[p]+1; k<=steps; k++, ca++)
03027                     do_path_effectors(sim, p, ca, k, steps, cache[p]->co, effector, dfra, cfra, &length, vec);
03028             }
03029 
03030             /* apply guide curves to path data */
03031             if (sim->psys->effectors && (psys->part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT)==0) {
03032                 for (k=0, ca=cache[p]; k<=steps; k++, ca++)
03033                     /* ca is safe to cast, since only co and vel are used */
03034                     do_guides(sim->psys->effectors, (ParticleKey*)ca, p, (float)k/(float)steps);
03035             }
03036 
03037             /* lattices have to be calculated separately to avoid mixups between effector calculations */
03038             if (psys->lattice) {
03039                 for (k=0, ca=cache[p]; k<=steps; k++, ca++)
03040                     calc_latt_deform(psys->lattice, ca->co, 1.0f);
03041             }
03042         }
03043 
03044         /* finally do rotation & velocity */
03045         for (k=1, ca=cache[p]+1; k<=steps; k++, ca++) {
03046             cache_key_incremental_rotation(ca, ca - 1, ca - 2, prev_tangent, k);
03047 
03048             if (k == steps)
03049                 copy_qt_qt(ca->rot, (ca - 1)->rot);
03050 
03051             /* set velocity */
03052             sub_v3_v3v3(ca->vel, ca->co, (ca-1)->co);
03053 
03054             if (k==1)
03055                 copy_v3_v3((ca-1)->vel, ca->vel);
03056 
03057             ca->time = (float)k/(float)steps;
03058         }
03059         /* First rotation is based on emitting face orientation.
03060          * This is way better than having flipping rotations resulting
03061          * from using a global axis as a rotation pole (vec_to_quat()).
03062          * It's not an ideal solution though since it disregards the
03063          * initial tangent, but taking that in to account will allow
03064          * the possibility of flipping again. -jahka
03065          */
03066         mat3_to_quat_is_ok(cache[p]->rot, rotmat);
03067     }
03068 
03069     psys->totcached = totpart;
03070 
03071     if (psys->lattice) {
03072         end_latt_deform(psys->lattice);
03073         psys->lattice= NULL;
03074     }
03075 
03076     if (vg_effector)
03077         MEM_freeN(vg_effector);
03078 
03079     if (vg_length)
03080         MEM_freeN(vg_length);
03081 }
03082 void psys_cache_edit_paths(Scene *scene, Object *ob, PTCacheEdit *edit, float cfra)
03083 {
03084     ParticleCacheKey *ca, **cache= edit->pathcache;
03085     ParticleEditSettings *pset = &scene->toolsettings->particle;
03086     
03087     PTCacheEditPoint *point = NULL;
03088     PTCacheEditKey *ekey = NULL;
03089 
03090     ParticleSystem *psys = edit->psys;
03091     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
03092     ParticleData *pa = psys ? psys->particles : NULL;
03093 
03094     ParticleInterpolationData pind;
03095     ParticleKey result;
03096     
03097     float birthtime = 0.0f, dietime = 0.0f;
03098     float t, time = 0.0f, keytime = 0.0f /*, frs_sec */;
03099     float hairmat[4][4], rotmat[3][3], prev_tangent[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f};
03100     int k, i;
03101     int steps = (int)pow(2.0, (double)pset->draw_step);
03102     int totpart = edit->totpoint, recalc_set=0;
03103     float sel_col[3];
03104     float nosel_col[3];
03105 
03106     steps = MAX2(steps, 4);
03107 
03108     if (!cache || edit->totpoint != edit->totcached) {
03109         /* clear out old and create new empty path cache */
03110         psys_free_path_cache(edit->psys, edit);
03111         cache= edit->pathcache= psys_alloc_path_cache_buffers(&edit->pathcachebufs, totpart, steps+1);
03112 
03113         /* set flag for update (child particles check this too) */
03114         for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<totpart; i++, point++)
03115             point->flag |= PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
03116         recalc_set = 1;
03117     }
03118 
03119     /* frs_sec = (psys || edit->pid.flag & PTCACHE_VEL_PER_SEC) ? 25.0f : 1.0f; */ /* UNUSED */
03120 
03121     if (pset->brushtype == PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT) {
03122         ;/* use weight painting colors now... */
03123     }
03124     else {
03125         sel_col[0] = (float)edit->sel_col[0] / 255.0f;
03126         sel_col[1] = (float)edit->sel_col[1] / 255.0f;
03127         sel_col[2] = (float)edit->sel_col[2] / 255.0f;
03128         nosel_col[0] = (float)edit->nosel_col[0] / 255.0f;
03129         nosel_col[1] = (float)edit->nosel_col[1] / 255.0f;
03130         nosel_col[2] = (float)edit->nosel_col[2] / 255.0f;
03131     }
03132 
03133     /*---first main loop: create all actual particles' paths---*/
03134     for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<totpart; i++, pa+=pa?1:0, point++) {
03135         if (edit->totcached && !(point->flag & PEP_EDIT_RECALC))
03136             continue;
03137 
03138         if (point->totkey == 0)
03139             continue;
03140 
03141         ekey = point->keys;
03142 
03143         pind.keyed = 0;
03144         pind.cache = NULL;
03145         pind.epoint = point;
03146         pind.bspline = psys ? (psys->part->flag & PART_HAIR_BSPLINE) : 0;
03147         pind.dm = NULL;
03148 
03149 
03150         /* should init_particle_interpolation set this ? */
03151         if (pset->brushtype==PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT) {
03152             pind.hkey[0] = NULL;
03153             /* pa != NULL since the weight brush is only available for hair */
03154             pind.hkey[1] = pa->hair;
03155         }
03156 
03157 
03158         memset(cache[i], 0, sizeof(*cache[i])*(steps+1));
03159 
03160         cache[i]->steps = steps;
03161 
03162         /*--get the first data points--*/
03163         init_particle_interpolation(ob, psys, pa, &pind);
03164 
03165         if (psys) {
03166             psys_mat_hair_to_global(ob, psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
03167             copy_v3_v3(rotmat[0], hairmat[2]);
03168             copy_v3_v3(rotmat[1], hairmat[1]);
03169             copy_v3_v3(rotmat[2], hairmat[0]);
03170         }
03171 
03172         birthtime = pind.birthtime;
03173         dietime = pind.dietime;
03174 
03175         if (birthtime >= dietime) {
03176             cache[i]->steps = -1;
03177             continue;
03178         }
03179 
03180         /*--interpolate actual path from data points--*/
03181         for (k=0, ca=cache[i]; k<=steps; k++, ca++) {
03182             time = (float)k / (float)steps;
03183             t = birthtime + time * (dietime - birthtime);
03184             result.time = -t;
03185             do_particle_interpolation(psys, i, pa, t, &pind, &result);
03186             copy_v3_v3(ca->co, result.co);
03187 
03188              /* non-hair points are already in global space */
03189             if (psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
03190                 mul_m4_v3(hairmat, ca->co);
03191 
03192                 if (k) {
03193                     cache_key_incremental_rotation(ca, ca - 1, ca - 2, prev_tangent, k);
03194 
03195                     if (k == steps)
03196                         copy_qt_qt(ca->rot, (ca - 1)->rot);
03197 
03198                     /* set velocity */
03199                     sub_v3_v3v3(ca->vel, ca->co, (ca - 1)->co);
03200 
03201                     if (k==1)
03202                         copy_v3_v3((ca - 1)->vel, ca->vel);
03203                 }
03204             }
03205             else {
03206                 ca->vel[0] = ca->vel[1] = 0.0f;
03207                 ca->vel[2] = 1.0f;
03208             }
03209 
03210             /* selection coloring in edit mode */
03211             if (pset->brushtype==PE_BRUSH_WEIGHT) {
03212                 float t2;
03213 
03214                 if (k==0) {
03215                     weight_to_rgb(ca->col, pind.hkey[1]->weight);
03216                 }
03217                 else {
03218                     float w1[3], w2[3];
03219                     keytime = (t - (*pind.ekey[0]->time))/((*pind.ekey[1]->time) - (*pind.ekey[0]->time));
03220 
03221                     weight_to_rgb(w1, pind.hkey[0]->weight);
03222                     weight_to_rgb(w2, pind.hkey[1]->weight);
03223 
03224                     interp_v3_v3v3(ca->col, w1, w2, keytime);
03225                 }
03226 
03227                 /* at the moment this is only used for weight painting.
03228                  * will need to move out of this check if its used elsewhere. */
03229                 t2 = birthtime + ((float)k/(float)steps) * (dietime - birthtime);
03230 
03231                 while (pind.hkey[1]->time < t2) pind.hkey[1]++;
03232                 pind.hkey[0] = pind.hkey[1] - 1;
03233             }
03234             else {
03235                 if ((ekey + (pind.ekey[0] - point->keys))->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
03236                     if ((ekey + (pind.ekey[1] - point->keys))->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
03237                         copy_v3_v3(ca->col, sel_col);
03238                     }
03239                     else {
03240                         keytime = (t - (*pind.ekey[0]->time))/((*pind.ekey[1]->time) - (*pind.ekey[0]->time));
03241                         interp_v3_v3v3(ca->col, sel_col, nosel_col, keytime);
03242                     }
03243                 }
03244                 else {
03245                     if ((ekey + (pind.ekey[1] - point->keys))->flag & PEK_SELECT) {
03246                         keytime = (t - (*pind.ekey[0]->time))/((*pind.ekey[1]->time) - (*pind.ekey[0]->time));
03247                         interp_v3_v3v3(ca->col, nosel_col, sel_col, keytime);
03248                     }
03249                     else {
03250                         copy_v3_v3(ca->col, nosel_col);
03251                     }
03252                 }
03253             }
03254 
03255             ca->time = t;
03256         }
03257         if (psys && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
03258             /* First rotation is based on emitting face orientation.
03259              * This is way better than having flipping rotations resulting
03260              * from using a global axis as a rotation pole (vec_to_quat()).
03261              * It's not an ideal solution though since it disregards the
03262              * initial tangent, but taking that in to account will allow
03263              * the possibility of flipping again. -jahka
03264              */
03265             mat3_to_quat_is_ok(cache[i]->rot, rotmat);
03266         }
03267     }
03268 
03269     edit->totcached = totpart;
03270 
03271     if (psys) {
03272         ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
03273         sim.scene= scene;
03274         sim.ob= ob;
03275         sim.psys= psys;
03276         sim.psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
03277 
03278         psys_cache_child_paths(&sim, cfra, 1);
03279     }
03280 
03281     /* clear recalc flag if set here */
03282     if (recalc_set) {
03283         for (i=0, point=edit->points; i<totpart; i++, point++)
03284             point->flag &= ~PEP_EDIT_RECALC;
03285     }
03286 }
03287 /************************************************/
03288 /*          Particle Key handling               */
03289 /************************************************/
03290 void copy_particle_key(ParticleKey *to, ParticleKey *from, int time)
03291 {
03292     if (time) {
03293         memcpy(to,from,sizeof(ParticleKey));
03294     }
03295     else {
03296         float to_time=to->time;
03297         memcpy(to,from,sizeof(ParticleKey));
03298         to->time=to_time;
03299     }
03300 }
03301 void psys_get_from_key(ParticleKey *key, float *loc, float *vel, float *rot, float *time)
03302 {
03303     if (loc) copy_v3_v3(loc,key->co);
03304     if (vel) copy_v3_v3(vel,key->vel);
03305     if (rot) copy_qt_qt(rot,key->rot);
03306     if (time) *time=key->time;
03307 }
03308 /*-------changing particle keys from space to another-------*/
03309 #if 0
03310 static void key_from_object(Object *ob, ParticleKey *key)
03311 {
03312     float q[4];
03313 
03314     add_v3_v3(key->vel, key->co);
03315 
03316     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat,key->co);
03317     mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat,key->vel);
03318     mat4_to_quat(q,ob->obmat);
03319 
03320     sub_v3_v3v3(key->vel,key->vel,key->co);
03321     mul_qt_qtqt(key->rot,q,key->rot);
03322 }
03323 #endif
03324 
03325 static void triatomat(float *v1, float *v2, float *v3, float (*uv)[2], float mat[][4])
03326 {
03327     float det, w1, w2, d1[2], d2[2];
03328 
03329     memset(mat, 0, sizeof(float)*4*4);
03330     mat[3][3]= 1.0f;
03331 
03332     /* first axis is the normal */
03333     normal_tri_v3( mat[2],v1, v2, v3);
03334 
03335     /* second axis along (1, 0) in uv space */
03336     if (uv) {
03337         d1[0]= uv[1][0] - uv[0][0];
03338         d1[1]= uv[1][1] - uv[0][1];
03339         d2[0]= uv[2][0] - uv[0][0];
03340         d2[1]= uv[2][1] - uv[0][1];
03341 
03342         det = d2[0]*d1[1] - d2[1]*d1[0];
03343 
03344         if (det != 0.0f) {
03345             det= 1.0f/det;
03346             w1= -d2[1]*det;
03347             w2= d1[1]*det;
03348 
03349             mat[1][0]= w1*(v2[0] - v1[0]) + w2*(v3[0] - v1[0]);
03350             mat[1][1]= w1*(v2[1] - v1[1]) + w2*(v3[1] - v1[1]);
03351             mat[1][2]= w1*(v2[2] - v1[2]) + w2*(v3[2] - v1[2]);
03352             normalize_v3(mat[1]);
03353         }
03354         else
03355             mat[1][0]= mat[1][1]= mat[1][2]= 0.0f;
03356     }
03357     else {
03358         sub_v3_v3v3(mat[1], v2, v1);
03359         normalize_v3(mat[1]);
03360     }
03361     
03362     /* third as a cross product */
03363     cross_v3_v3v3(mat[0], mat[1], mat[2]);
03364 }
03365 
03366 static void psys_face_mat(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleData *pa, float mat[][4], int orco)
03367 {
03368     float v[3][3];
03369     MFace *mface;
03370     OrigSpaceFace *osface;
03371     float (*orcodata)[3];
03372 
03373     int i = pa->num_dmcache==DMCACHE_NOTFOUND ? pa->num : pa->num_dmcache;
03374     
03375     if (i==-1 || i >= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm)) { unit_m4(mat); return; }
03376 
03377     mface=dm->getTessFaceData(dm,i,CD_MFACE);
03378     osface=dm->getTessFaceData(dm,i,CD_ORIGSPACE);
03379     
03380     if (orco && (orcodata=dm->getVertDataArray(dm, CD_ORCO))) {
03381         copy_v3_v3(v[0], orcodata[mface->v1]);
03382         copy_v3_v3(v[1], orcodata[mface->v2]);
03383         copy_v3_v3(v[2], orcodata[mface->v3]);
03384 
03385         /* ugly hack to use non-transformed orcos, since only those
03386          * give symmetric results for mirroring in particle mode */
03387         if (DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX))
03388             transform_mesh_orco_verts(ob->data, v, 3, 1);
03389     }
03390     else {
03391         dm->getVertCo(dm,mface->v1,v[0]);
03392         dm->getVertCo(dm,mface->v2,v[1]);
03393         dm->getVertCo(dm,mface->v3,v[2]);
03394     }
03395 
03396     triatomat(v[0], v[1], v[2], (osface)? osface->uv: NULL, mat);
03397 }
03398 
03399 void psys_mat_hair_to_object(Object *UNUSED(ob), DerivedMesh *dm, short from, ParticleData *pa, float hairmat[][4])
03400 {
03401     float vec[3];
03402 
03403     psys_face_mat(0, dm, pa, hairmat, 0);
03404     psys_particle_on_dm(dm, from, pa->num, pa->num_dmcache, pa->fuv, pa->foffset, vec, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
03405     copy_v3_v3(hairmat[3],vec);
03406 }
03407 
03408 void psys_mat_hair_to_orco(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, short from, ParticleData *pa, float hairmat[][4])
03409 {
03410     float vec[3], orco[3];
03411 
03412     psys_face_mat(ob, dm, pa, hairmat, 1);
03413     psys_particle_on_dm(dm, from, pa->num, pa->num_dmcache, pa->fuv, pa->foffset, vec, 0, 0, 0, orco, 0);
03414 
03415     /* see psys_face_mat for why this function is called */
03416     if (DM_get_vert_data_layer(dm, CD_ORIGINDEX))
03417         transform_mesh_orco_verts(ob->data, &orco, 1, 1);
03418     copy_v3_v3(hairmat[3],orco);
03419 }
03420 
03421 void psys_vec_rot_to_face(DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleData *pa, float vec[3])
03422 {
03423     float mat[4][4];
03424 
03425     psys_face_mat(0, dm, pa, mat, 0);
03426     transpose_m4(mat); /* cheap inverse for rotation matrix */
03427     mul_mat3_m4_v3(mat, vec);
03428 }
03429 
03430 void psys_mat_hair_to_global(Object *ob, DerivedMesh *dm, short from, ParticleData *pa, float hairmat[][4])
03431 {
03432     float facemat[4][4];
03433 
03434     psys_mat_hair_to_object(ob, dm, from, pa, facemat);
03435 
03436     mult_m4_m4m4(hairmat, ob->obmat, facemat);
03437 }
03438 
03439 /************************************************/
03440 /*          ParticleSettings handling           */
03441 /************************************************/
03442 ModifierData *object_add_particle_system(Scene *scene, Object *ob, const char *name)
03443 {
03444     ParticleSystem *psys;
03445     ModifierData *md;
03446     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
03447 
03448     if (!ob || ob->type != OB_MESH)
03449         return NULL;
03450 
03451     psys = ob->particlesystem.first;
03452     for (; psys; psys=psys->next)
03453         psys->flag &= ~PSYS_CURRENT;
03454 
03455     psys = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ParticleSystem), "particle_system");
03456     psys->pointcache = BKE_ptcache_add(&psys->ptcaches);
03457     BLI_addtail(&ob->particlesystem, psys);
03458 
03459     psys->part = psys_new_settings("ParticleSettings", NULL);
03460 
03461     if (BLI_countlist(&ob->particlesystem)>1)
03462         BLI_snprintf(psys->name, sizeof(psys->name), "ParticleSystem %i", BLI_countlist(&ob->particlesystem));
03463     else
03464         strcpy(psys->name, "ParticleSystem");
03465 
03466     md= modifier_new(eModifierType_ParticleSystem);
03467 
03468     if (name)   BLI_strncpy(md->name, name, sizeof(md->name));
03469     else        BLI_snprintf(md->name, sizeof(md->name), "ParticleSystem %i", BLI_countlist(&ob->particlesystem));
03470     modifier_unique_name(&ob->modifiers, md);
03471 
03472     psmd= (ParticleSystemModifierData*) md;
03473     psmd->psys=psys;
03474     BLI_addtail(&ob->modifiers, md);
03475 
03476     psys->totpart=0;
03477     psys->flag = PSYS_ENABLED|PSYS_CURRENT;
03478     psys->cfra = BKE_frame_to_ctime(scene, CFRA + 1);
03479 
03480     DAG_scene_sort(G.main, scene);
03481     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03482 
03483     return md;
03484 }
03485 void object_remove_particle_system(Scene *scene, Object *ob)
03486 {
03487     ParticleSystem *psys = psys_get_current(ob);
03488     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd;
03489     ModifierData *md;
03490 
03491     if (!psys)
03492         return;
03493 
03494     /* clear all other appearances of this pointer (like on smoke flow modifier) */
03495     if ((md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_Smoke))) {
03496         SmokeModifierData *smd = (SmokeModifierData *)md;
03497         if ((smd->type == MOD_SMOKE_TYPE_FLOW) && smd->flow && smd->flow->psys)
03498             if (smd->flow->psys == psys)
03499                 smd->flow->psys = NULL;
03500     }
03501 
03502     if ((md = modifiers_findByType(ob, eModifierType_DynamicPaint))) {
03503         DynamicPaintModifierData *pmd = (DynamicPaintModifierData *)md;
03504         if (pmd->brush && pmd->brush->psys)
03505             if (pmd->brush->psys == psys)
03506                 pmd->brush->psys = NULL;
03507     }
03508 
03509     /* clear modifier */
03510     psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
03511     BLI_remlink(&ob->modifiers, psmd);
03512     modifier_free((ModifierData *)psmd);
03513 
03514     /* clear particle system */
03515     BLI_remlink(&ob->particlesystem, psys);
03516     psys_free(ob,psys);
03517 
03518     if (ob->particlesystem.first)
03519         ((ParticleSystem *) ob->particlesystem.first)->flag |= PSYS_CURRENT;
03520     else
03521         ob->mode &= ~OB_MODE_PARTICLE_EDIT;
03522 
03523     DAG_scene_sort(G.main, scene);
03524     DAG_id_tag_update(&ob->id, OB_RECALC_DATA);
03525 }

03527 {
