03533     part->bb_align=PART_BB_VIEW;
03534     part->bb_split_offset=PART_BB_OFF_LINEAR;
03535     part->flag=PART_EDISTR|PART_TRAND|PART_HIDE_ADVANCED_HAIR;
03536 
03537     part->sta= 1.0;
03538     part->end= 200.0;
03539     part->lifetime= 50.0;
03540     part->jitfac= 1.0;
03541     part->totpart= 1000;
03542     part->grid_res= 10;
03543     part->timetweak= 1.0;
03544     part->courant_target = 0.2;
03545     
03546     part->integrator= PART_INT_MIDPOINT;
03547     part->phystype= PART_PHYS_NEWTON;
03548     part->hair_step= 5;
03549     part->keys_step= 5;
03550     part->draw_step= 2;
03551     part->ren_step= 3;
03552     part->adapt_angle= 5;
03553     part->adapt_pix= 3;
03554     part->kink_axis= 2;
03555     part->kink_amp_clump= 1.f;
03556     part->reactevent= PART_EVENT_DEATH;
03557     part->disp=100;
03558     part->from= PART_FROM_FACE;
03559 
03560     part->normfac= 1.0f;
03561 
03562     part->mass=1.0;
03563     part->size=0.05;
03564     part->childsize=1.0;
03565 
03566     part->rotmode = PART_ROT_VEL;
03567     part->avemode = PART_AVE_VELOCITY;
03568 
03569     part->child_nbr=10;
03570     part->ren_child_nbr=100;
03571     part->childrad=0.2f;
03572     part->childflat=0.0f;
03573     part->clumppow=0.0f;
03574     part->kink_amp=0.2f;
03575     part->kink_freq=2.0;
03576 
03577     part->rough1_size=1.0;
03578     part->rough2_size=1.0;
03579     part->rough_end_shape=1.0;
03580 
03581     part->clength=1.0f;
03582     part->clength_thres=0.0f;
03583 
03584     part->draw= PART_DRAW_EMITTER;
03585     part->draw_line[0]=0.5;
03586     part->path_start = 0.0f;
03587     part->path_end = 1.0f;
03588 
03589     part->bb_size[0] = part->bb_size[1] = 1.0f;
03590 
03591     part->keyed_loops = 1;
03592 
03593     part->color_vec_max = 1.f;
03594     part->draw_col = PART_DRAW_COL_MAT;
03595 
03596     part->simplify_refsize= 1920;
03597     part->simplify_rate= 1.0f;
03598     part->simplify_transition= 0.1f;
03599     part->simplify_viewport= 0.8;
03600 
03601     if (!part->effector_weights)
03602         part->effector_weights = BKE_add_effector_weights(NULL);
03603 }
03604 
03605 
03606 ParticleSettings *psys_new_settings(const char *name, Main *main)
03607 {
03608     ParticleSettings *part;
03609 
03610     if (main==NULL)
03611         main = G.main;
03612 
03613     part= alloc_libblock(&main->particle, ID_PA, name);
03614     
03615     default_particle_settings(part);
03616 
03617     return part;
03618 }
03619 
03620 ParticleSettings *psys_copy_settings(ParticleSettings *part)
03621 {
03622     ParticleSettings *partn;
03623     int a;
03624 
03625     partn= copy_libblock(&part->id);
03626     partn->pd= MEM_dupallocN(part->pd);
03627     partn->pd2= MEM_dupallocN(part->pd2);
03628     partn->effector_weights= MEM_dupallocN(part->effector_weights);
03629     partn->fluid= MEM_dupallocN(part->fluid);
03630 
03631     partn->boids = boid_copy_settings(part->boids);
03632 
03633     for (a=0; a<MAX_MTEX; a++) {
03634         if (part->mtex[a]) {
03635             partn->mtex[a]= MEM_mallocN(sizeof(MTex), "psys_copy_tex");
03636             memcpy(partn->mtex[a], part->mtex[a], sizeof(MTex));
03637             id_us_plus((ID *)partn->mtex[a]->tex);
03638         }
03639     }
03640 
03641     BLI_duplicatelist(&partn->dupliweights, &part->dupliweights);
03642     
03643     return partn;
03644 }
03645 
03646 static void expand_local_particlesettings(ParticleSettings *part)
03647 {
03648     int i;
03649     id_lib_extern((ID *)part->dup_group);
03650 
03651     for (i=0; i<MAX_MTEX; i++) {
03652         if (part->mtex[i]) id_lib_extern((ID *)part->mtex[i]->tex);
03653     }
03654 }
03655 
03656 void make_local_particlesettings(ParticleSettings *part)
03657 {
03658     Main *bmain= G.main;
03659     Object *ob;
03660     int is_local= FALSE, is_lib= FALSE;
03661 
03662     /* - only lib users: do nothing
03663      * - only local users: set flag
03664      * - mixed: make copy
03665      */
03666     
03667     if (part->id.lib==0) return;
03668     if (part->id.us==1) {
03669         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &part->id);
03670         expand_local_particlesettings(part);
03671         return;
03672     }
03673 
03674     /* test objects */
03675     for (ob= bmain->object.first; ob && ELEM(FALSE, is_lib, is_local); ob= ob->id.next) {
03676         ParticleSystem *psys=ob->particlesystem.first;
03677         for (; psys; psys=psys->next) {
03678             if (psys->part==part) {
03679                 if (ob->id.lib) is_lib= TRUE;
03680                 else is_local= TRUE;
03681             }
03682         }
03683     }
03684     
03685     if (is_local && is_lib==FALSE) {
03686         id_clear_lib_data(bmain, &part->id);
03687         expand_local_particlesettings(part);
03688     }
03689     else if (is_local && is_lib) {
03690         ParticleSettings *part_new= psys_copy_settings(part);
03691         part_new->id.us= 0;
03692 
03693         /* Remap paths of new ID using old library as base. */
03694         BKE_id_lib_local_paths(bmain, part->id.lib, &part_new->id);
03695 
03696         /* do objects */
03697         for (ob= bmain->object.first; ob; ob= ob->id.next) {
03698             ParticleSystem *psys;
03699             for (psys= ob->particlesystem.first; psys; psys=psys->next) {
03700                 if (psys->part==part && ob->id.lib==0) {
03701                     psys->part= part_new;
03702                     part_new->id.us++;
03703                     part->id.us--;
03704                 }
03705             }
03706         }
03707     }
03708 }
03709 
03710 /************************************************/
03711 /*          Textures                            */
03712 /************************************************/
03713 
03714 static int get_particle_uv(DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleData *pa, int face_index, const float fuv[4], char *name, float *texco)
03715 {
03716     MFace *mf;
03717     MTFace *tf;
03718     int i;
03719     
03720     tf= CustomData_get_layer_named(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE, name);
03721 
03722     if (tf == NULL)
03723         tf= CustomData_get_layer(&dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE);
03724 
03725     if (tf == NULL)
03726         return 0;
03727 
03728     if (pa) {
03729         i= (pa->num_dmcache==DMCACHE_NOTFOUND)? pa->num: pa->num_dmcache;
03730         if (i >= dm->getNumTessFaces(dm))
03731             i = -1;
03732     }
03733     else
03734         i= face_index;
03735 
03736     if (i==-1) {
03737         texco[0]= 0.0f;
03738         texco[1]= 0.0f;
03739         texco[2]= 0.0f;
03740     }
03741     else {
03742         mf= dm->getTessFaceData(dm, i, CD_MFACE);
03743 
03744         psys_interpolate_uvs(&tf[i], mf->v4, fuv, texco);
03745 
03746         texco[0]= texco[0]*2.0f - 1.0f;
03747         texco[1]= texco[1]*2.0f - 1.0f;
03748         texco[2]= 0.0f;
03749     }
03750 
03751     return 1;
03752 }
03753 
03754 #define SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(type, pvalue, texfac) if ((event & mtex->mapto) & type) {pvalue = texture_value_blend(def, pvalue, value, texfac, blend);}
03755 #define CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(type, pvalue) if (event & type) { if (pvalue < 0.f) pvalue = 1.f+pvalue; CLAMP(pvalue, 0.0f, 1.0f); }
03756 #define CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POSNEG(type, pvalue) if (event & type) { CLAMP(pvalue, -1.0f, 1.0f); }
03757 
03758 static void get_cpa_texture(DerivedMesh *dm, ParticleSystem *psys, ParticleSettings *part, ParticleData *par, int child_index, int face_index, const float fw[4], float *orco, ParticleTexture *ptex, int event, float cfra)
03759 {
03760     MTex *mtex, **mtexp = part->mtex;
03761     int m;
03762     float value, rgba[4], texvec[3];
03763 
03764     ptex->ivel = ptex->life = ptex->exist = ptex->size = ptex->damp =
03765         ptex->gravity = ptex->field = ptex->time = ptex->clump = ptex->kink =
03766         ptex->effector = ptex->rough1 = ptex->rough2 = ptex->roughe = 1.f;
03767 
03768     ptex->length= 1.0f - part->randlength * PSYS_FRAND(child_index + 26);
03769     ptex->length*= part->clength_thres < PSYS_FRAND(child_index + 27) ? part->clength : 1.0f;
03770 
03771     for (m=0; m<MAX_MTEX; m++, mtexp++) {
03772         mtex = *mtexp;
03773         if (mtex && mtex->mapto) {
03774             float def=mtex->def_var;
03775             short blend=mtex->blendtype;
03776             short texco = mtex->texco;
03777 
03778             if (ELEM(texco, TEXCO_UV, TEXCO_ORCO) && (ELEM(part->from, PART_FROM_FACE, PART_FROM_VOLUME) == 0 || part->distr == PART_DISTR_GRID))
03779                 texco = TEXCO_GLOB;
03780 
03781             switch(texco) {
03782             case TEXCO_GLOB:
03783                 copy_v3_v3(texvec, par->state.co);
03784                 break;
03785             case TEXCO_OBJECT:
03786                 copy_v3_v3(texvec, par->state.co);
03787                 if (mtex->object)
03788                     mul_m4_v3(mtex->object->imat, texvec);
03789                 break;
03790             case TEXCO_UV:
03791                 if (fw && get_particle_uv(dm, NULL, face_index, fw, mtex->uvname, texvec))
03792                     break;
03793                 /* no break, failed to get uv's, so let's try orco's */
03794             case TEXCO_ORCO:
03795                 copy_v3_v3(texvec, orco);
03796                 break;
03797             case TEXCO_PARTICLE:
03798                 /* texture coordinates in range [-1,1] */
03799                 texvec[0] = 2.f * (cfra - par->time)/(par->dietime-par->time) - 1.f;
03800                 texvec[1] = 0.f;
03801                 texvec[2] = 0.f;
03802                 break;
03803             }
03804 
03805             externtex(mtex, texvec, &value, rgba, rgba+1, rgba+2, rgba+3, 0);
03806 
03807             if ((event & mtex->mapto) & PAMAP_ROUGH)
03808                 ptex->rough1= ptex->rough2= ptex->roughe= texture_value_blend(def,ptex->rough1,value,mtex->roughfac,blend);
03809 
03810             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_LENGTH, ptex->length, mtex->lengthfac);
03811             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_CLUMP, ptex->clump, mtex->clumpfac);
03812             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_KINK, ptex->kink, mtex->kinkfac);
03813             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_DENS, ptex->exist, mtex->padensfac);
03814         }
03815     }
03816 
03817     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_LENGTH, ptex->length);
03818     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_CLUMP, ptex->clump);
03819     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_KINK, ptex->kink);
03820     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_ROUGH, ptex->rough1);
03821     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_DENS, ptex->exist);
03822 }
03823 void psys_get_texture(ParticleSimulationData *sim, ParticleData *pa, ParticleTexture *ptex, int event, float cfra)
03824 {
03825     ParticleSettings *part = sim->psys->part;
03826     MTex **mtexp = part->mtex;
03827     MTex *mtex;
03828     int m;
03829     float value, rgba[4], co[3], texvec[3];
03830     int setvars=0;
03831 
03832     /* initialize ptex */
03833     ptex->ivel = ptex->life = ptex->exist = ptex->size = ptex->damp =
03834         ptex->gravity = ptex->field = ptex->length = ptex->clump = ptex->kink =
03835         ptex->effector = ptex->rough1 = ptex->rough2 = ptex->roughe = 1.f;
03836 
03837     ptex->time = (float)(pa - sim->psys->particles)/(float)sim->psys->totpart;
03838 
03839     for (m=0; m<MAX_MTEX; m++, mtexp++) {
03840         mtex = *mtexp;
03841         if (mtex && mtex->mapto) {
03842             float def=mtex->def_var;
03843             short blend=mtex->blendtype;
03844             short texco = mtex->texco;
03845 
03846             if (texco == TEXCO_UV && (ELEM(part->from, PART_FROM_FACE, PART_FROM_VOLUME) == 0 || part->distr == PART_DISTR_GRID))
03847                 texco = TEXCO_GLOB;
03848 
03849             switch(texco) {
03850             case TEXCO_GLOB:
03851                 copy_v3_v3(texvec, pa->state.co);
03852                 break;
03853             case TEXCO_OBJECT:
03854                 copy_v3_v3(texvec, pa->state.co);
03855                 if (mtex->object)
03856                     mul_m4_v3(mtex->object->imat, texvec);
03857                 break;
03858             case TEXCO_UV:
03859                 if (get_particle_uv(sim->psmd->dm, pa, 0, pa->fuv, mtex->uvname, texvec))
03860                     break;
03861                 /* no break, failed to get uv's, so let's try orco's */
03862             case TEXCO_ORCO:
03863                 psys_particle_on_emitter(sim->psmd,sim->psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,co,0,0,0,texvec, 0);
03864                 break;
03865             case TEXCO_PARTICLE:
03866                 /* texture coordinates in range [-1,1] */
03867                 texvec[0] = 2.f * (cfra - pa->time)/(pa->dietime-pa->time) - 1.f;
03868                 texvec[1] = 0.f;
03869                 texvec[2] = 0.f;
03870                 break;
03871             }
03872 
03873             externtex(mtex, texvec, &value, rgba, rgba+1, rgba+2, rgba+3, 0);
03874 
03875             if ((event & mtex->mapto) & PAMAP_TIME) {
03876                 /* the first time has to set the base value for time regardless of blend mode */
03877                 if ((setvars&MAP_PA_TIME)==0) {
03878                     int flip= (mtex->timefac < 0.0f);
03879                     float timefac= fabsf(mtex->timefac);
03880                     ptex->time *= 1.0f - timefac;
03881                     ptex->time += timefac * ((flip)? 1.0f - value : value);
03882                     setvars |= MAP_PA_TIME;
03883                 }
03884                 else
03885                     ptex->time= texture_value_blend(def,ptex->time,value,mtex->timefac,blend);
03886             }
03887             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_LIFE, ptex->life, mtex->lifefac)
03888             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_DENS, ptex->exist, mtex->padensfac)
03889             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_SIZE, ptex->size, mtex->sizefac)
03890             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_IVEL, ptex->ivel, mtex->ivelfac)
03891             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_FIELD, ptex->field, mtex->fieldfac)
03892             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_GRAVITY, ptex->gravity, mtex->gravityfac)
03893             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_DAMP, ptex->damp, mtex->dampfac)
03894             SET_PARTICLE_TEXTURE(PAMAP_LENGTH, ptex->length, mtex->lengthfac)
03895         }
03896     }
03897 
03898     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_TIME, ptex->time)
03899     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_LIFE, ptex->life)
03900     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_DENS, ptex->exist)
03901     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_SIZE, ptex->size)
03902     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POSNEG(PAMAP_IVEL, ptex->ivel)
03903     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POSNEG(PAMAP_FIELD, ptex->field)
03904     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POSNEG(PAMAP_GRAVITY, ptex->gravity)
03905     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_DAMP, ptex->damp)
03906     CLAMP_PARTICLE_TEXTURE_POS(PAMAP_LENGTH, ptex->length)
03907 }
03908 /************************************************/
03909 /*          Particle State                      */
03910 /************************************************/
03911 float psys_get_timestep(ParticleSimulationData *sim)
03912 {
03913     return 0.04f * sim->psys->part->timetweak;
03914 }
03915 float psys_get_child_time(ParticleSystem *psys, ChildParticle *cpa, float cfra, float *birthtime, float *dietime)
03916 {
03917     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
03918     float time, life;
03919 
03920     if (part->childtype==PART_CHILD_FACES) {
03921         int w=0;
03922         time=0.0;
03923         while (w<4 && cpa->pa[w]>=0) {
03924             time+=cpa->w[w]*(psys->particles+cpa->pa[w])->time;
03925             w++;
03926         }
03927 
03928         life = part->lifetime * (1.0f - part->randlife * PSYS_FRAND(cpa - psys->child + 25));
03929     }
03930     else {
03931         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles + cpa->parent;
03932 
03933         time = pa->time;
03934         life = pa->lifetime;
03935     }
03936 
03937     if (birthtime)
03938         *birthtime = time;
03939     if (dietime)
03940         *dietime = time+life;
03941 
03942     return (cfra-time)/life;
03943 }
03944 float psys_get_child_size(ParticleSystem *psys, ChildParticle *cpa, float UNUSED(cfra), float *UNUSED(pa_time))
03945 {
03946     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
03947     float size; // time XXX
03948     
03949     if (part->childtype==PART_CHILD_FACES)
03950         size=part->size;
03951     else
03952         size=psys->particles[cpa->parent].size;
03953 
03954     size*=part->childsize;
03955 
03956     if (part->childrandsize != 0.0f)
03957         size *= 1.0f - part->childrandsize * PSYS_FRAND(cpa - psys->child + 26);
03958 
03959     return size;
03960 }
03961 static void get_child_modifier_parameters(ParticleSettings *part, ParticleThreadContext *ctx, ChildParticle *cpa, short cpa_from, int cpa_num, float *cpa_fuv, float *orco, ParticleTexture *ptex)
03962 {
03963     ParticleSystem *psys = ctx->sim.psys;
03964     int i = cpa - psys->child;
03965 
03966     get_cpa_texture(ctx->dm, psys, part, psys->particles + cpa->pa[0], i, cpa_num, cpa_fuv, orco, ptex, PAMAP_DENS|PAMAP_CHILD, psys->cfra);
03967 
03968 
03969     if (ptex->exist < PSYS_FRAND(i + 24))
03970         return;
03971 
03972     if (ctx->vg_length)
03973         ptex->length*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_length);
03974     if (ctx->vg_clump)
03975         ptex->clump*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_clump);
03976     if (ctx->vg_kink)
03977         ptex->kink*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_kink);
03978     if (ctx->vg_rough1)
03979         ptex->rough1*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_rough1);
03980     if (ctx->vg_rough2)
03981         ptex->rough2*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_rough2);
03982     if (ctx->vg_roughe)
03983         ptex->roughe*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_roughe);
03984     if (ctx->vg_effector)
03985         ptex->effector*=psys_interpolate_value_from_verts(ctx->dm,cpa_from,cpa_num,cpa_fuv,ctx->vg_effector);
03986 }
03987 static void do_child_modifiers(ParticleSimulationData *sim, ParticleTexture *ptex, ParticleKey *par, float *par_rot, ChildParticle *cpa, float *orco, float mat[4][4], ParticleKey *state, float t)
03988 {
03989     ParticleSettings *part = sim->psys->part;
03990     int i = cpa - sim->psys->child;
03991     int guided = 0;
03992 
03993     float kink_freq = part->kink_freq;
03994     float rough1 = part->rough1;
03995     float rough2 = part->rough2;
03996     float rough_end = part->rough_end;
03997 
03998     if (ptex) {
03999         kink_freq *= ptex->kink;
04000         rough1 *= ptex->rough1;
04001         rough2 *= ptex->rough2;
04002         rough_end *= ptex->roughe;
04003     }
04004 
04005     if (part->flag & PART_CHILD_EFFECT)
04006         /* state is safe to cast, since only co and vel are used */
04007         guided = do_guides(sim->psys->effectors, (ParticleKey*)state, cpa->parent, t);
04008 
04009     if (guided==0) {
04010         float clump = do_clump(state, par, t, part->clumpfac, part->clumppow, ptex ? ptex->clump : 1.f);
04011 
04012         if (kink_freq != 0.f) {
04013             float kink_amp = part->kink_amp * (1.f - part->kink_amp_clump * clump);
04014 
04015             do_kink(state, par, par_rot, t, kink_freq, part->kink_shape,
04016                     kink_amp, part->kink_flat, part->kink, part->kink_axis,
04017                     sim->ob->obmat, sim->psys->part->childtype == PART_CHILD_FACES);
04018         }
04019     }
04020 
04021     if (rough1 > 0.f)
04022         do_rough(orco, mat, t, rough1, part->rough1_size, 0.0, state);
04023 
04024     if (rough2 > 0.f)
04025         do_rough(sim->psys->frand + ((i + 27) % (PSYS_FRAND_COUNT - 3)), mat, t, rough2, part->rough2_size, part->rough2_thres, state);
04026 
04027     if (rough_end > 0.f)
04028         do_rough_end(sim->psys->frand + ((i + 27) % (PSYS_FRAND_COUNT - 3)), mat, t, rough_end, part->rough_end_shape, state);
04029 }
04030 /* get's hair (or keyed) particles state at the "path time" specified in state->time */
04031 void psys_get_particle_on_path(ParticleSimulationData *sim, int p, ParticleKey *state, int vel)
04032 {
04033     PARTICLE_PSMD;
04034     ParticleSystem *psys = sim->psys;
04035     ParticleSettings *part = sim->psys->part;
04036     Material *ma = give_current_material(sim->ob, part->omat);
04037     ParticleData *pa;
04038     ChildParticle *cpa;
04039     ParticleTexture ptex;
04040     ParticleKey *par=0, keys[4], tstate;
04041     ParticleThreadContext ctx; /* fake thread context for child modifiers */
04042     ParticleInterpolationData pind;
04043 
04044     float t;
04045     float co[3], orco[3];
04046     float hairmat[4][4];
04047     int totpart = psys->totpart;
04048     int totchild = psys->totchild;
04049     short between = 0, edit = 0;
04050 
04051     int keyed = part->phystype & PART_PHYS_KEYED && psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED;
04052     int cached = !keyed && part->type != PART_HAIR;
04053 
04054     float *cpa_fuv; int cpa_num; short cpa_from;
04055 
04056     /* initialize keys to zero */
04057     memset(keys, 0, 4*sizeof(ParticleKey));
04058 
04059     t=state->time;
04060     CLAMP(t, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04061 
04062     if (p<totpart) {
04063         /* interpolate pathcache directly if it exist */
04064         if (psys->pathcache) {
04065             ParticleCacheKey result;
04066             interpolate_pathcache(psys->pathcache[p], t, &result);
04067             copy_v3_v3(state->co, result.co);
04068             copy_v3_v3(state->vel, result.vel);
04069             copy_qt_qt(state->rot, result.rot);
04070         }
04071         /* otherwise interpolate with other means */
04072         else {
04073             pa = psys->particles + p;
04074 
04075             pind.keyed = keyed;
04076             pind.cache = cached ? psys->pointcache : NULL;
04077             pind.epoint = NULL;
04078             pind.bspline = (psys->part->flag & PART_HAIR_BSPLINE);
04079             /* pind.dm disabled in editmode means we don't get effectors taken into
04080              * account when subdividing for instance */
04081             pind.dm = psys_in_edit_mode(sim->scene, psys) ? NULL : psys->hair_out_dm;
04082             init_particle_interpolation(sim->ob, psys, pa, &pind);
04083             do_particle_interpolation(psys, p, pa, t, &pind, state);
04084 
04085             if (pind.dm) {
04086                 mul_m4_v3(sim->ob->obmat, state->co);
04087                 mul_mat3_m4_v3(sim->ob->obmat, state->vel);
04088             }
04089             else if (!keyed && !cached && !(psys->flag & PSYS_GLOBAL_HAIR)) {
04090                 if ((pa->flag & PARS_REKEY)==0) {
04091                     psys_mat_hair_to_global(sim->ob, sim->psmd->dm, part->from, pa, hairmat);
04092                     mul_m4_v3(hairmat, state->co);
04093                     mul_mat3_m4_v3(hairmat, state->vel);
04094 
04095                     if (sim->psys->effectors && (part->flag & PART_CHILD_GUIDE)==0) {
04096                         do_guides(sim->psys->effectors, state, p, state->time);
04097                         /* TODO: proper velocity handling */
04098                     }
04099 
04100                     if (psys->lattice && edit==0)
04101                         calc_latt_deform(psys->lattice, state->co,1.0f);
04102                 }
04103             }
04104         }
04105     }
04106     else if (totchild) {
04107         //invert_m4_m4(imat,ob->obmat);
04108 
04109         /* interpolate childcache directly if it exists */
04110         if (psys->childcache) {
04111             ParticleCacheKey result;
04112             interpolate_pathcache(psys->childcache[p-totpart], t, &result);
04113             copy_v3_v3(state->co, result.co);
04114             copy_v3_v3(state->vel, result.vel);
04115             copy_qt_qt(state->rot, result.rot);
04116         }
04117         else {
04118             cpa=psys->child+p-totpart;
04119 
04120             if (state->time < 0.0f)
04121                 t = psys_get_child_time(psys, cpa, -state->time, NULL, NULL);
04122         
04123             if (totchild && part->childtype==PART_CHILD_FACES) {
04124                 /* part->parents could still be 0 so we can't test with totparent */
04125                 between=1;
04126             }
04127             if (between) {
04128                 int w = 0;
04129                 float foffset;
04130 
04131                 /* get parent states */
04132                 while (w<4 && cpa->pa[w]>=0) {
04133                     keys[w].time = state->time;
04134                     psys_get_particle_on_path(sim, cpa->pa[w], keys+w, 1);
04135                     w++;
04136                 }
04137 
04138                 /* get the original coordinates (orco) for texture usage */
04139                 cpa_num=cpa->num;
04140             
04141                 foffset= cpa->foffset;
04142                 cpa_fuv = cpa->fuv;
04143                 cpa_from = PART_FROM_FACE;
04144 
04145                 psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,cpa_from,cpa_num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,foffset,co,0,0,0,orco,0);
04146 
04147                 /* we need to save the actual root position of the child for positioning it accurately to the surface of the emitter */
04148                 //copy_v3_v3(cpa_1st,co);
04149 
04150                 //mul_m4_v3(ob->obmat,cpa_1st);
04151 
04152                 pa = psys->particles + cpa->parent;
04153 
04154                 if (part->type == PART_HAIR)
04155                     psys_mat_hair_to_global(sim->ob, sim->psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
04156                 else
04157                     unit_m4(hairmat);
04158 
04159                 pa=0;
04160             }
04161                                                                                     else {
04162             /* get the parent state */
04163             keys->time = state->time;
04164             psys_get_particle_on_path(sim, cpa->parent, keys,1);
04165 
04166             /* get the original coordinates (orco) for texture usage */
04167             pa=psys->particles+cpa->parent;
04168 
04169             cpa_from=part->from;
04170             cpa_num=pa->num;
04171             cpa_fuv=pa->fuv;
04172 
04173             
04174 
04175             if (part->type == PART_HAIR) {
04176                 psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,cpa_from,cpa_num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa_fuv,pa->foffset,co,0,0,0,orco,0);
04177                 psys_mat_hair_to_global(sim->ob, sim->psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
04178             }
04179             else {
04180                 copy_v3_v3(orco, cpa->fuv);
04181                 unit_m4(hairmat);
04182             }
04183         }
04184 
04185             /* correct child ipo timing */
04186     #if 0 // XXX old animation system
04187             if ((part->flag&PART_ABS_TIME)==0 && part->ipo) {
04188                 calc_ipo(part->ipo, 100.0f*t);
04189                 execute_ipo((ID *)part, part->ipo);
04190             }
04191     #endif // XXX old animation system
04192         
04193             /* get different child parameters from textures & vgroups */
04194             memset(&ctx, 0, sizeof(ParticleThreadContext));
04195             ctx.sim = *sim;
04196             ctx.dm = psmd->dm;
04197             ctx.ma = ma;
04198             /* TODO: assign vertex groups */
04199             get_child_modifier_parameters(part, &ctx, cpa, cpa_from, cpa_num, cpa_fuv, orco, &ptex);
04200 
04201             if (between) {
04202                 int w=0;
04203 
04204                 state->co[0] = state->co[1] = state->co[2] = 0.0f;
04205                 state->vel[0] = state->vel[1] = state->vel[2] = 0.0f;
04206 
04207                 /* child position is the weighted sum of parent positions */
04208                 while (w<4 && cpa->pa[w]>=0) {
04209                     state->co[0] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].co[0];
04210                     state->co[1] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].co[1];
04211                     state->co[2] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].co[2];
04212 
04213                     state->vel[0] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].vel[0];
04214                     state->vel[1] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].vel[1];
04215                     state->vel[2] += cpa->w[w] * keys[w].vel[2];
04216                     w++;
04217                 }
04218                 /* apply offset for correct positioning */
04219                 //add_v3_v3(state->co, cpa_1st);
04220             }
04221             else {
04222                 /* offset the child from the parent position */
04223                 offset_child(cpa, keys, keys->rot, state, part->childflat, part->childrad);
04224             }
04225 
04226             par = keys;
04227 
04228             if (vel)
04229                 copy_particle_key(&tstate, state, 1);
04230 
04231             /* apply different deformations to the child path */
04232             do_child_modifiers(sim, &ptex, par, par->rot, cpa, orco, hairmat, state, t);
04233 
04234             /* try to estimate correct velocity */
04235             if (vel) {
04236                 ParticleKey tstate;
04237                 float length = len_v3(state->vel);
04238 
04239                 if (t>=0.001f) {
04240                     tstate.time=t-0.001f;
04241                     psys_get_particle_on_path(sim,p,&tstate,0);
04242                     sub_v3_v3v3(state->vel,state->co,tstate.co);
04243                     normalize_v3(state->vel);
04244                 }
04245                 else {
04246                     tstate.time=t+0.001f;
04247                     psys_get_particle_on_path(sim,p,&tstate,0);
04248                     sub_v3_v3v3(state->vel,tstate.co,state->co);
04249                     normalize_v3(state->vel);
04250                 }
04251 
04252                 mul_v3_fl(state->vel, length);
04253             }
04254         }
04255     }
04256 }
04257 /* gets particle's state at a time, returns 1 if particle exists and can be seen and 0 if not */
04258 int psys_get_particle_state(ParticleSimulationData *sim, int p, ParticleKey *state, int always)
04259 {
04260     ParticleSystem *psys = sim->psys;
04261     ParticleSettings *part = psys->part;
04262     ParticleData *pa = NULL;
04263     ChildParticle *cpa = NULL;
04264     float cfra;
04265     int totpart = psys->totpart;
04266     float timestep = psys_get_timestep(sim);
04267 
04268     /* negative time means "use current time" */
04269     cfra = state->time > 0 ? state->time : BKE_curframe(sim->scene);
04270 
04271     if (p>=totpart) {
04272         if (!psys->totchild)
04273             return 0;
04274 
04275         if (part->childtype == PART_CHILD_FACES) {
04276             if (!(psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED))
04277                 return 0;
04278 
04279             cpa = psys->child + p - totpart;
04280 
04281             state->time = psys_get_child_time(psys, cpa, cfra, NULL, NULL);
04282 
04283             if (!always) {
04284                 if ((state->time < 0.0f && !(part->flag & PART_UNBORN)) ||
04285                     (state->time > 1.0f && !(part->flag & PART_DIED)))
04286                 {
04287                     return 0;
04288                 }
04289             }
04290 
04291             state->time= (cfra - (part->sta + (part->end - part->sta) * PSYS_FRAND(p + 23))) / (part->lifetime * PSYS_FRAND(p + 24));
04292 
04293             psys_get_particle_on_path(sim, p, state,1);
04294             return 1;
04295         }
04296         else {
04297             cpa = sim->psys->child + p - totpart;
04298             pa = sim->psys->particles + cpa->parent;
04299         }
04300     }
04301     else {
04302         pa = sim->psys->particles + p;
04303     }
04304 
04305     if (pa) {
04306         if (!always) {
04307             if ((cfra < pa->time    && (part->flag & PART_UNBORN) == 0) ||
04308                 (cfra > pa->dietime && (part->flag & PART_DIED)   == 0))
04309             {
04310                 return 0;
04311             }
04312         }
04313 
04314         cfra = MIN2(cfra, pa->dietime);
04315     }
04316 
04317     if (sim->psys->flag & PSYS_KEYED) {
04318         state->time= -cfra;
04319         psys_get_particle_on_path(sim, p, state,1);
04320         return 1;
04321     }
04322     else {
04323         if (cpa) {
04324             float mat[4][4];
04325             ParticleKey *key1;
04326             float t = (cfra - pa->time) / pa->lifetime;
04327 
04328             key1=&pa->state;
04329             offset_child(cpa, key1, key1->rot, state, part->childflat, part->childrad);
04330 
04331             CLAMP(t, 0.0f, 1.0f);
04332 
04333             unit_m4(mat);
04334             do_child_modifiers(sim, NULL, key1, key1->rot, cpa, cpa->fuv, mat, state, t);
04335 
04336             if (psys->lattice)
04337                 calc_latt_deform(sim->psys->lattice, state->co,1.0f);
04338         }
04339         else {
04340             if (pa->state.time==cfra || ELEM(part->phystype,PART_PHYS_NO,PART_PHYS_KEYED))
04341                 copy_particle_key(state, &pa->state, 1);
04342             else if (pa->prev_state.time==cfra)
04343                 copy_particle_key(state, &pa->prev_state, 1);
04344             else {
04345                 float dfra, frs_sec = sim->scene->r.frs_sec;
04346                 /* let's interpolate to try to be as accurate as possible */
04347                 if (pa->state.time + 2.f >= state->time && pa->prev_state.time - 2.f <= state->time) {
04348                     if (pa->prev_state.time >= pa->state.time || pa->prev_state.time < 0.f) {
04349                         /* prev_state is wrong so let's not use it, this can happen at frames 1, 0 or particle birth */
04350                         dfra = state->time - pa->state.time;
04351 
04352                         copy_particle_key(state, &pa->state, 1);
04353 
04354                         madd_v3_v3v3fl(state->co, state->co, state->vel, dfra/frs_sec);
04355                     }
04356                     else {
04357                         ParticleKey keys[4];
04358                         float keytime;
04359 
04360                         copy_particle_key(keys+1, &pa->prev_state, 1);
04361                         copy_particle_key(keys+2, &pa->state, 1);
04362 
04363                         dfra = keys[2].time - keys[1].time;
04364 
04365                         keytime = (state->time - keys[1].time) / dfra;
04366 
04367                         /* convert velocity to timestep size */
04368                         mul_v3_fl(keys[1].vel, dfra * timestep);
04369                         mul_v3_fl(keys[2].vel, dfra * timestep);
04370                         
04371                         psys_interpolate_particle(-1, keys, keytime, state, 1);
04372                         
04373                         /* convert back to real velocity */
04374                         mul_v3_fl(state->vel, 1.f / (dfra * timestep));
04375 
04376                         interp_v3_v3v3(state->ave, keys[1].ave, keys[2].ave, keytime);
04377                         interp_qt_qtqt(state->rot, keys[1].rot, keys[2].rot, keytime);
04378                     }
04379                 }
04380                 else if (pa->state.time + 1.f >= state->time && pa->state.time - 1.f <= state->time) {
04381                     /* linear interpolation using only pa->state */
04382 
04383                     dfra = state->time - pa->state.time;
04384 
04385                     copy_particle_key(state, &pa->state, 1);
04386 
04387                     madd_v3_v3v3fl(state->co, state->co, state->vel, dfra/frs_sec);
04388                 }
04389                 else {
04390                     /* extrapolating over big ranges is not accurate so let's just give something close to reasonable back */
04391                     copy_particle_key(state, &pa->state, 0);
04392                 }
04393             }
04394 
04395             if (sim->psys->lattice)
04396                 calc_latt_deform(sim->psys->lattice, state->co,1.0f);
04397         }
04398         
04399         return 1;
04400     }
04401 }
04402 
04403 void psys_get_dupli_texture(ParticleSystem *psys, ParticleSettings *part, ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd, ParticleData *pa, ChildParticle *cpa, float *uv, float *orco)
04404 {
04405     MFace *mface;
04406     MTFace *mtface;
04407     float loc[3];
04408     int num;
04409 
04410     uv[0] = uv[1] = 0.f;
04411 
04412     if (cpa) {
04413         if (part->childtype == PART_CHILD_FACES) {
04414             mtface= CustomData_get_layer(&psmd->dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE);
04415             if (mtface) {
04416                 mface= psmd->dm->getTessFaceData(psmd->dm, cpa->num, CD_MFACE);
04417                 mtface += cpa->num;
04418                 psys_interpolate_uvs(mtface, mface->v4, cpa->fuv, uv);
04419             }
04420         
04421             psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,PART_FROM_FACE,cpa->num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,cpa->foffset,loc,0,0,0,orco,0);
04422             return;
04423         }
04424         else {
04425             pa = psys->particles + cpa->pa[0];
04426         }
04427     }
04428 
04429     if (part->from == PART_FROM_FACE) {
04430         mtface= CustomData_get_layer(&psmd->dm->faceData, CD_MTFACE);
04431         num= pa->num_dmcache;
04432 
04433         if (num == DMCACHE_NOTFOUND)
04434             num= pa->num;
04435 
04436         if (num >= psmd->dm->getNumTessFaces(psmd->dm)) {
04437             /* happens when simplify is enabled
04438              * gives invalid coords but would crash otherwise */
04439             num= DMCACHE_NOTFOUND;
04440         }
04441 
04442         if (mtface && num != DMCACHE_NOTFOUND) {
04443             mface= psmd->dm->getTessFaceData(psmd->dm, num, CD_MFACE);
04444             mtface += num;
04445             psys_interpolate_uvs(mtface, mface->v4, pa->fuv, uv);
04446         }
04447     }
04448 
04449     psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,loc,0,0,0,orco,0);
04450 }
04451 
04452 void psys_get_dupli_path_transform(ParticleSimulationData *sim, ParticleData *pa, ChildParticle *cpa, ParticleCacheKey *cache, float mat[][4], float *scale)
04453 {
04454     Object *ob = sim->ob;
04455     ParticleSystem *psys = sim->psys;
04456     ParticleSystemModifierData *psmd = sim->psmd;
04457     float loc[3], nor[3], vec[3], side[3], len;
04458     float xvec[3] = {-1.0, 0.0, 0.0}, nmat[3][3];
04459 
04460     sub_v3_v3v3(vec, (cache+cache->steps)->co, cache->co);
04461     len= normalize_v3(vec);
04462 
04463     if (pa == NULL && psys->part->childflat != PART_CHILD_FACES)
04464         pa = psys->particles + cpa->pa[0];
04465 
04466     if (pa)
04467         psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,sim->psys->part->from,pa->num,pa->num_dmcache,pa->fuv,pa->foffset,loc,nor,0,0,0,0);
04468     else
04469         psys_particle_on_emitter(psmd,PART_FROM_FACE,cpa->num,DMCACHE_ISCHILD,cpa->fuv,cpa->foffset,loc,nor,0,0,0,0);
04470 
04471     if (psys->part->rotmode == PART_ROT_VEL) {
04472         copy_m3_m4(nmat, ob->imat);
04473         transpose_m3(nmat);
04474         mul_m3_v3(nmat, nor);
04475         normalize_v3(nor);
04476 
04477         /* make sure that we get a proper side vector */
04478         if (fabs(dot_v3v3(nor,vec))>0.999999) {
04479             if (fabs(dot_v3v3(nor,xvec))>0.999999) {
04480                 nor[0] = 0.0f;
04481                 nor[1] = 1.0f;
04482                 nor[2] = 0.0f;
04483             }
04484             else {
04485                 nor[0] = 1.0f;
04486                 nor[1] = 0.0f;
04487                 nor[2] = 0.0f;
04488             }
04489         }
04490         cross_v3_v3v3(side, nor, vec);
04491         normalize_v3(side);
04492 
04493         /* rotate side vector around vec */
04494         if (psys->part->phasefac != 0) {
04495             float q_phase[4];
04496             float phasefac = psys->part->phasefac;
04497             if (psys->part->randphasefac != 0.0f)
04498                 phasefac += psys->part->randphasefac * PSYS_FRAND((pa-psys->particles) + 20);
04499             axis_angle_to_quat( q_phase, vec, phasefac*(float)M_PI);
04500 
04501             mul_qt_v3(q_phase, side);
04502         }
04503 
04504         cross_v3_v3v3(nor, vec, side);
04505 
04506         unit_m4(mat);
04507         copy_v3_v3(mat[0], vec);
04508         copy_v3_v3(mat[1], side);
04509         copy_v3_v3(mat[2], nor);
04510     }
04511     else {
04512         quat_to_mat4(mat, pa->state.rot);
04513     }
04514 
04515     *scale= len;
04516 }
04517 
04518 void psys_make_billboard(ParticleBillboardData *bb, float xvec[3], float yvec[3], float zvec[3], float center[3])
04519 {
04520     float onevec[3] = {0.0f,0.0f,0.0f}, tvec[3], tvec2[3];
04521 
04522     xvec[0] = 1.0f; xvec[1] = 0.0f; xvec[2] = 0.0f;
04523     yvec[0] = 0.0f; yvec[1] = 1.0f; yvec[2] = 0.0f;
04524 
04525     /* can happen with bad pointcache or physics calculation
04526      * since this becomes geometry, nan's and inf's crash raytrace code.
04527      * better not allow this. */
04528     if ( !finite(bb->vec[0]) || !finite(bb->vec[1]) || !finite(bb->vec[2]) ||
04529         !finite(bb->vel[0]) || !finite(bb->vel[1]) || !finite(bb->vel[2]) )
04530     {
04531         zero_v3(bb->vec);
04532         zero_v3(bb->vel);
04533 
04534         zero_v3(xvec);
04535         zero_v3(yvec);
04536         zero_v3(zvec);
04537         zero_v3(center);
04538 
04539         return;
04540     }
04541 
04542     if (bb->align < PART_BB_VIEW)
04543         onevec[bb->align]=1.0f;
04544 
04545     if (bb->lock && (bb->align == PART_BB_VIEW)) {
04546         normalize_v3_v3(xvec, bb->ob->obmat[0]);
04547         normalize_v3_v3(yvec, bb->ob->obmat[1]);
04548         normalize_v3_v3(zvec, bb->ob->obmat[2]);
04549     }
04550     else if (bb->align == PART_BB_VEL) {
04551         float temp[3];
04552 
04553         normalize_v3_v3(temp, bb->vel);
04554 
04555         sub_v3_v3v3(zvec, bb->ob->obmat[3], bb->vec);
04556 
04557         if (bb->lock) {
04558             float fac = -dot_v3v3(zvec, temp);
04559 
04560             madd_v3_v3fl(zvec, temp, fac);
04561         }
04562         normalize_v3(zvec);
04563 
04564         cross_v3_v3v3(xvec,temp,zvec);
04565         normalize_v3(xvec);
04566 
04567         cross_v3_v3v3(yvec,zvec,xvec);
04568     }
04569     else {
04570         sub_v3_v3v3(zvec, bb->ob->obmat[3], bb->vec);
04571         if (bb->lock)
04572             zvec[bb->align] = 0.0f;
04573         normalize_v3(zvec);
04574 
04575         if (bb->align < PART_BB_VIEW)
04576             cross_v3_v3v3(xvec, onevec, zvec);
04577         else
04578             cross_v3_v3v3(xvec, bb->ob->obmat[1], zvec);
04579         normalize_v3(xvec);
04580 
04581         cross_v3_v3v3(yvec,zvec,xvec);
04582     }
04583 
04584     copy_v3_v3(tvec, xvec);
04585     copy_v3_v3(tvec2, yvec);
04586 
04587     mul_v3_fl(xvec, cos(bb->tilt * (float)M_PI));
04588     mul_v3_fl(tvec2, sin(bb->tilt * (float)M_PI));
04589     add_v3_v3(xvec, tvec2);
04590 
04591     mul_v3_fl(yvec, cos(bb->tilt * (float)M_PI));
04592     mul_v3_fl(tvec, -sin(bb->tilt * (float)M_PI));
04593     add_v3_v3(yvec, tvec);
04594 
04595     mul_v3_fl(xvec, bb->size[0]);
04596     mul_v3_fl(yvec, bb->size[1]);
04597 
04598     madd_v3_v3v3fl(center, bb->vec, xvec, bb->offset[0]);
04599     madd_v3_v3fl(center, yvec, bb->offset[1]);
04600 }
04601 
04602 void psys_apply_hair_lattice(Scene *scene, Object *ob, ParticleSystem *psys)
04603 {
04604     ParticleSimulationData sim= {0};
04605     sim.scene= scene;
04606     sim.ob= ob;
04607     sim.psys= psys;
04608     sim.psmd= psys_get_modifier(ob, psys);
04609 
04610     psys->lattice = psys_get_lattice(&sim);
04611 
04612     if (psys->lattice) {
04613         ParticleData *pa = psys->particles;
04614         HairKey *hkey;
04615         int p, h;
04616         float hairmat[4][4], imat[4][4];
04617 
04618         for (p=0; p<psys->totpart; p++, pa++) {
04619             psys_mat_hair_to_global(sim.ob, sim.psmd->dm, psys->part->from, pa, hairmat);
04620             invert_m4_m4(imat, hairmat);
04621 
04622             hkey = pa->hair;
04623             for (h=0; h<pa->totkey; h++, hkey++) {
04624                 mul_m4_v3(hairmat, hkey->co);
04625                 calc_latt_deform(psys->lattice, hkey->co, 1.0f);
04626                 mul_m4_v3(imat, hkey->co);
04627             }
04628         }
04629         
04630         end_latt_deform(psys->lattice);
04631         psys->lattice= NULL;
04632 
04633         /* protect the applied shape */
04634         psys->flag |= PSYS_EDITED;
04635     }
04636 }
